description: Welcome to this new game experience. Did you enjoy playing hide and seek with your friends when you were young? Then download this app and watch how child and technology experience an completely new game together. Hide one of these four (hiding)buddies and let your child or friend look for them in a fun and interactive way. Every character (buddy) has its own characteristics that you'll have to discover while playing. That's why finding your buddies will be a new experience every single time. Teach children (and grandfathers and grandmothers) play and rediscover hide-and-seek in a new way! Play hide and seek as never before. Unique features are: Gaming fun for young and old Playable from 2 years and up Every hiding buddy has its own recognizable characteristics 2 difficulty levels Completely in the English and Dutch language Big and colorful buttons making interaction very simple "Hide and seek" play it with your friends. hide and seek can also be played on tablet or phone.
release_text: Add option to blank the screen while the device is hidden

You are beautiful ... always have been .. atleast in your mom's eyes. ;-) With this app, you have the potential to transform into a head turner and become the star of the party ! Whether you are a veteran or just a novice, this app can help you look and feel your best. Welcome to the World of Beauty. This app collects the latest beauty trends and secrets from across the world wide web - Whether it is the latest looks being donned by the celebs or royalty or whether it is basic tips on how to give yourself a manicure or how to do makeup right, you will likely pick up a trick or two about how to make yourself look even more gorgeous. This is a neat word search game in which you need to find hidden animals in a grid. It has a huge collection of animals - ranging from the tame domestic to the wild wild ones. Various animals are arranged randomly and are "hidden" in a grid going in many directions, and your objective is find those animals. When you find an animal successfully, the app highlights it for you and you move on the next. It also keeps track of your score in terms how many animals you were able to discover in a puzzle. And what's more ... you earn REAL points (mPoints) that can be used for REAL rewards on retailers like Amazon etc.

description: GATOEL (Gamelan ToeToel) A Virtual Gamelan which is one of a kind. You will feel like playing a real Gamelan. ToeToel (read: tutul) means "touch" in javanese native language, so it means you only need to touch to play gamelan. description: Find Australia’s best establishments with the touch of a button. Est. in 1977, the Australian Good Food and Travel Guide (AGFG) is Australia’s single most comprehensive rating authority. Every year AGFG reviewers independently appraise over 25,000 restaurants, accommodation, wineries, bars, attractions, providores and function venues throughout Australia. Covering all of Australia’s major cities and the majority of smaller towns, find the best establishments near you or across the country. Compare prices, see photos, read and write customer reviews, vote for your favourite places, find recommended specialities, access exclusive offers, take advantage of member specials and benefit from discounted rates. description: bMobile NOW Invoice Lite is the trial version of bMobile NOW Invoice PRO. Before purchasing NOW Invoice PRO, download and install this app - NOW Invoice Lite. Go Make Sales with your Android device. Easily create invoices, orders & payments in the field. Email or print invoices and send effortlessly to QuickBooks. Customers and inventory sync with QB for up-to-date balances, prices and quantity on hand. bMobile NOW Invoice Lite. MAKE SALES IN MINUTES ON ANDROID DEVICE Customers and Inventory are synced with QB for up-to-date balances, pricing and quantity on hand. After the invoice is saved the orders are sent to QB therefore eliminating manual entry. Benefits of bMobile Now Invoice include: • Email/ print invoices in the field. • Capture customers signature for acceptance • Use a bar code reader for accuracy and speed. RAPID CUSTOMER/INVENTORY LOOK-UP No more clipboards. From your Android device, instantly access your entire list of contacts and customers from your QuickBooks data -- including terms and balances. Instantly see your inventory list with quantity on hand, list price and drill down to view cost. Daily sales, reconciliation and inventory replenishment reports included. Send updated customer information to QuickBooks. Search customers by scrolling, text search or voice command search. Call your customers with just a tap. QUICKLY RECALL PRODUCTS & PRICES Get up-to-the-minute product pricing information anytime. Product information is imported from QuickBooks through bMobile Sync Manager, and stored in the Android device for rapid recall. Instantly add items to an order, check item pricing, or edit item information. Items may be designated as taxable or non-taxable. Search for items by scrolling, using the text search, or through voice commands (available on certain devices). PAPERLESS INVOICING Kick the pen and paper habit. No more paper invoices with unreadable handwriting and math errors. NOW Invoice allows complete order creation and payment processing with the touch of your finger. Quickly add items from your QuickBooks inventory list, apply payments to accounts, issue credits, review account balance, and check payment terms. AUTO-EMAIL & WIRELESSLY PRINT INVOICES No more lost or unreadable invoices with e-invoicing from NOW Invoice Pro. Invoices can be auto-emailed to your customers after each sale. Include a personal message or promotional offer in your invoice message. Email a copy to yourself or your office as a backup record to your stored data. Utilize a wireless printer to provide customers with a professional invoice that includes a signature and your logo. GREAT FOR THESE INDUSTRIES: Lock and key, landscaping, veterinarians, food and beverage, Ice, appliance repair, mechanics, plumbers, HVAC, electricians, personal fitness, field service and any other industry that needs invoicing in the field can eliminate the paper hassle. NOW Invoice for QuickBooks syncs data with QuickBooks (Windows ver 2009 or later only). Subscription to Intuit App Center required to sync data with your pc version of QuickBooks. See NOW Invoice Pro for more info. Upgrade to NOW Invoice Pro for $9.99. To learn more about NOW for QuickBooks and Android follow this link- http://bmobileroute.com/products/now-for-android-a-ios/now-invoicing-for-android To learn more about Intuit App Center subscription follow this link- http://appcenter.intuit.com/Faq
release_text: V 3.3.6 -Fixed an issue that cause the database to be unreadable upon e-mailing invoices. -Added new option to leave more space at the bottom of the E-Mailed invoice to allow a longer invoice footnote/company terms. -Added the ability to show a customer the invoice footnote/company terms before signing.

Archer Animal Hunt is an adventurous game it will test your skills of hunting you have limited time to hunt all the animals you can move the Archer in the environment by using joystick and screen touch rotation.There are numbers of animals that you have to hunt to complete the game if time limit expired then game will be over.Archer can walk and run in the environment so you can aim the animals quite easily by moving and rotating the Archer. There is a timer on top center of the screen keep watching it you have time limit to hunt 10 animals. The number of animals at left top of screen decreases as you hunt the animals you can also use the telescope to see the distant animals. keep eagle eye on animals. Use joystick to move the archer all around in the ground and follow the animals touch and rotate the Archer and set the aim press fire button.Archer will release the arrow towards the animals that you have selected.if aim is correct animal will be hit otherwise not. If you can not hunt all the animals in time limit game will be over.When fisrt level is completed successfully then some wolfs attack on you in second level.You have to kill the wolf to get rid off it. How To play: - Archer with arrows - Joystick at left bottom of screen - Board at left top of screen displaying numbers of animals. - Timer at top center of screen - Telescope and fire button icon at right side of screen - 3D and attractive environment - Telescope to see the distant animals.
release_text: Minor bugs fixed Graphics improved Environment improved Multiple levels added New level added

description: Army Base Parking is interesting and adventurous game. In this game vehicle is in army base camp, park this vehicle on parking location. Hurdles, road blocks and other things are in the way, if the vehicle collides with anything than game is over. The arrow signs are available for user guide. The accelerator, break and steering buttons are on the screen. Use these buttons for complete the level easily. Multiple vehicles are available. You can choose any vehicle. Multiple levels are in game, complete first level and promote in next level. Only three minutes time for completion a level. Completion of difficult level in limited time is a challenge for the users. How to Play: - The accelerator button is on the right bottom side of the screen. - The break button is on the left side of the accelerator button. - Steering is on the left side of the screen. - Arrow signs for user guidance. Features: - Accelerator - Break button - Steering - Arrow signs - Easy to play - Good UI

City Cargo Transporter is very interesting game. A vehicle that is loaded with big wood logs.The User's task is to transport luggage safely from starting place to destination. If any wood log is dropped from the vehicle, then game is over. When the luggage reach at destination, then the level is complete. That's challenge have to be completed in limited time.This game contain multiple levels. Complete one level and survive for next. Every next level is different from previous. Use the accelerator, brake, gear and staring for completion the task easily. How To Play: - Accelerator button is on the right bottom side of the screen. - Gear is front of accelerator, use gear for forward and reverse. - Brake button is on the left side of the accelerator. - Stearing is on the left bottom side of the screen. Features: - Vehicle - Accelerator - Gear - Brake button - Steering - Big wood logs - Easy to play - Good UI

Following the success of Animoca’s popular edutainment app for Android comes Alphabet Car 2, and this time we’re learning about animals, colors and shapes! Alphabet Car 2 is loaded with brand new content and more options to make learning as fun and effective as can be! Fasten your seatbelts and get ready to learn! In Alphabet Car 2, you start out by driving Lion Bus, a cute little bus disguised as a furry feline who will take you through an educational ride full of pleasant surprises. Just like its predecessor, this app lets you take the wheel, bringing a busload of fun into remembering new words. Immerse yourself in an engaging learning experience that you and your little one can share using your eyes, ears and hands. Alphabet Car 2 features 45 brand new words to learn one letter at a time, on top of 15 other words from the original Alphabet Car. The all new content comes with the same interactive mechanics as the original: Rotate your device just like a steering wheel to drive Lion Bus through colorful roads. When a big block letter appears, aim your bus toward it and make contact to hear how the letter is pronounced. When you collect all the letters needed, the full word will be pronounced for you, and a card will appear with the word and an illustration. It’s all about animals, colors and shapes, so don’t be alarmed if you see some furry friends coming out to play! Alphabet Car 2 is a fun and effective way to learn about animals, colors and shapes, using visual, auditory, and kinesthetic learning styles to strengthen hand-eye coordination. Enjoy the app’s colorful 3D graphics and upbeat music, but most of all, enjoy spending quality time learning new words with your little one!

description: Have you ever wanted to learn how to sing? Fulfill your dreams with Vocalist! Vocalist develops your singing skills and vocal range by giving you various singing exercises, ranging from very simple to advanced. Vocalist is aimed for beginners as well as experienced singers who want to fine tune their voice and expand their range. The singing exercises play a short melody which you then need to sing yourself. Vocalist shows you instant feedback on where you hit the right note, and where you were off. Vocalist offers several training options: Game: Continuous play, with increasing difficulty Lessons: Practice specific lessons, divided into difficulty categories Songs: Practice singing real songs Tuner: Free singing, improvisation, and instrument tuning Tips: Various tips on how to sing Download Vocalist now and start singing!

Многие люди, услышав слово "йога", представляют себе некоего худощавого индуса, завязанного в замысловатый узел, непременно с заброшенными за голову ногами. Что делает этот воображаемый индус? А главное зачем? Есть ли какой-либо смысл в том, чтобы сгибать, разгибать скручивать своё тело и затем на какое-то время замирать в этом положении? Эти упражнения называются асанами. Асаны развивают наше тело, приносят покой и душевное равновесие. Они позволяют взять под контроль негативные эмоции и усилить все положительные. Мы представляем вам сборник содержащий различные виды асан, каждая из которых содержит не только описание самой позиции, но и показания/противопоказания к выполнению. Комбинируя различные асаны, вы сможете разработать индивидуальный цикл занятия, подходящий именно вам. Надеемся, что наш сборник вам поможет Намаскар) Many people hear the word "yoga", imagine some lean Hindu tied into an intricate knot, certainly with abandoned his head down. What makes this imaginary Hindu? And most importantly why? Is there any meaning to bend, straighten your body twist and then stopping for a while in this position? These exercises are called asanas. Asanas develop our body, bring tranquility and peace of mind. They allow you to take control of negative emotions and strengthen all positive. We present you a collection containing different types of asanas, each of which contains not only a description of the position itself, but also indications / contraindications to. Combining various asanas, you can develop an individual cycle classes suitable for you. We hope that our collection will help you Namaskar)

If you have any difficulties with the app, please contact us at safesalonrating@gmail.com Don’t choose your salon based on price alone, because “A ten dollar special is NO deal in a 1 STAR salon.” Dr. Robert Spalding DPM Great salons offer more than cutting edge nail designs & quality products; they ensure client’s safety and satisfaction. Charging Time is a simple application that estimates the charging time of your battery and indicates the final time. The application automatically starts when you connect your device to a charger and through of several methods of estimation, determines charging time and displays it in a simple clock on screen. Charging Time stores information about the different charges and then improve the estimate depending on the type of charger used and the charge curve of your device. For this reason, the estimates will be more exact after making some full charges. Additionally shown in some devices, the intensity of electric current battery charge You can disable the automatic start from the configuration screen.
release_text: Includes battery charging current for other phone models. Performance improvements and correction of minor bugs.

description: DAS NEUE BLATT ist auch als ePaper auf jedem Tablet und Smartphone das Servicemagazin unter den Frauenzeitschriften. Es ist die perfekte Kombination aus spannender Unterhaltung und vielen Tipps und Anregungen für den Alltag. description: Use at your own risk! Porsche 928 79/95 electric circuit app. Annoyed by the absence of a physical fuse/relay chart? Contains: * Fuse/relay charts for 78/79, 80, 82, 83/84, 85/86, 87/88, 89, 90, 91, 92/95 . * Blueprint showing all ground points. * EZF LH22, 35 pin L-Jet connector pin layouts. * A.F.C. injection Test values. Wiring diagrams: * A.F.C. injection * Airco. * 1985 body. * 1990 S4 body. * 1990 S4 ABS/PDS/airbag/trailor coupling, brakepad wear indicator. * 1990 S4 Central electrics. * 1990 S4 Central locks. * 1990 S4 Cruise-control. * 1990 S4 Engine cooling, heater, airco. * 1990 S4 Instrument cluster. * 1990 S4 Lights USA & Rest of world. * 1990 S4 Engine, fuel and ignition, cruise control. * 1990 S4 Outsidemirror, powerseat. * 1990 S4 Seat + mirror memory. * 1990 S4 Radio alarm system. Extra: 4x direct links to insta-view online PET catalogs 78/82, 83/86, 87/91, 92/95. Option to download as pdf for future offline reference.

developer: AAA MATCH 3 GAMES FOR KIDS CASUAL GEMS
description: Have fun relaxing in the beach while you connect the dots to earn a higher score in 60 seconds! Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze is an original match game created in the classic connect the dots fashion! Isn’t this what you most wanted? We sure love it! Match beach items in this racing puzzle and get excited in a free puzzle game for Android! With highly addictive gameplay and simple and easy touch control, Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze has only one top goal : to clear as much beach items as you can before time ends. Tap any beach item and drag your finger across the same beach items surrounding it to link them up like in the screenshots and boom! You will get your points! Match, connect and have a lot of fun dragging your fingers in your screen as the beach items light up! You will see the line connecting your beach items so you know you are doing it correctly. With Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze you will have fun as you touch and connect quickly before time ends and get your wanted big score that you can share with your friends! Repeat your match as many times as you want and train yourself towards becoming the ruler of connect dots puzzle games amongst your friends or family. This friendly game is amazing for kids and children of most ages, even babies! Enjoy an original match game with multi colors and speedy gameplay; Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze is the classic puzzle game to download for Android. Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze FEATURES: Drag a line with your finger to connect and match the beach items in an original game. Matching line can be drawn vertically, horizontally and diagonally. Try to connect the most beach items to score higher! Beat yourself in each match and train to progress towards a higher score! Shoot for a top score in this puzzle war with time Share you enchanted scores online by accessing our social sharing options at the end of each round Big feature – this free match dots style game does not require internet to play. Play an incredible dots matching game offline! Play fast, easy and with fun in this free to play puzzle for kids / babies / children / toddlers / and of course, for adults If you like Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze, you can enjoy more of our free puzzle games for kids and match 3 games for kids and adults including: Bubble Candy Combos Classic, Colors Crush Party Arena Bash, Kitty Sunshine Pet Blitz Mania, Pirate Bay Guardians Age Smash, Pizza Heat Blaster Mania Clash, A Happy Friends Farm Match 3, Fruit Fever Rush Match Puzzle, Girls Quest Puzzle Matching Go, Hungry Fish Match 3 Evolution, Toy Vacation Beach Crush Match, Horror Swipe Deluxe Drift Saga, Doctor Bacterium Wars Demand, Diamond Blaze Bank Tap Attack, Candy Twister Wonderland Rush, Beach Vacation Speed Tap Blaze.

Celebrity Ice Cream Shop is an Ice Cream making app fit for a Celebrity!! Choose from a vast selection of colorful cones, chocolate cones, and some dipped in nuts, and sprinkles! Then go and drag your ice cream to your cone, and build it up like a tower! Not only fun to decorate, but fun to make your ice cream as tall as possible with tons of toppings, syrups, and yummy choices for eating!! Once you're done, snap a pic, or eat your creation!!! Fun to build, easy physics, you can even play around with your ice cream, remove layers easily, and knock some over!! Fun for the entire family!!

Cupcakes are America's most favorite treat! Grab your utensils, and start mixing the ingredients from scratch! Once the ingredients are mixed, drag the Cupcake Mix into the bowl, and start mixing! Bang them in the oven, and watch your Cupcakes bake into warm, delicious, delectable treats! But wait! You must decorate! Smack on gobs of delicious Frosting with a plethora of colors, and designs! Grab some toppings, and sprinkle them over your delicious creation! When you're done, smack your lips, and start eating your delicious cupcake, virtually of course! Then save your creation and make your friends envious of your calorie free treat! Fun for the entire family!! Loads of Frosting, toppings, and extras to keep the kiddos occupied while you try to get stuff done! Features Include: Tons of Frosting to top your Delicious Cupcake with! Tons of Flavors of Cupcakes including Vanilla, Chocolate, Strawberry, Red Velvet, and More! A Plethora of toppings to sprinkle on your gooey, warm, and delicious Cupcake! Tons of Extras like Halloween Toppings to top your Cupcake with, and Holiday updates to come! Easy to use interface, and fun for the entire family! Very kid friendly interface, and easy to use, even young toddlers can use this app!

Prize Claw Machine is the most entertaining game you will find at the Arcade, Grocery Store, or local Toy Shop!! Skill, Patience, and Dexterity are all required to win at this fun, and engaging game! Pop a quarter in, pick a game, and start playing! Choose from 2 Fun Arcade Games: Toys or Treats & Desserts! Grab the toys and drop them in the hatch! Fun for all ages, easy to pick up and play, and endless fun with free play or challenge modes! Even the adults will love this classic arcade favorite!! Countdown for Chromecast tracks the time until important dates in the past or future`. How long until Christmas? How many days away is your vacation? When is that next big test you should be studying for? Keep track of the time between now and then with Countdown for Chromecast! Pull up a picture of the beach and ocean and stay excited for your trip right around the corner. Count-up Feature: How long have you been in a relationship? Keep track of how long your product has been on the market? Track dates in the past with Countdown's magnificent count-up feature! release_text: - Bug fixes for connecting/reconnecting to chromecast devices - Settings will no longer crash on 10" devices - No longer crashes if your device doesn't have the right version of Google Play Services.

description: A multiplayer game for your Chromecast! - A note from the developer: Hey Everyone, With this project, we've come to find the Chromecast isn't designed to run real time games like Up Down Fish. Please be aware ahead of time that the experience isn't perfect. We've optimized the game to squeeze every ounce of performance we can out of the chromecast, but we know it's still glitchy. We've had fun developing this project and still feel it's a fun game to play with your friends. We hope you can enjoy the game even with it's technical limitations. As always, thanks for your support and feedback! Sincerely, Beard Cocoon Help your fish swim through the pillars by tapping your device to swim up and down. Work on your highscore and bring it with you to other Chromecasts. Compete against your friends or family in this silly multiplayer Chromecast game. • Great party game! • Family friendly! • Up to 10 players at once! Let us know what you think of Up Down Fish by leaving us a review. We're excited to add more features soon, so please let us know what you'd like to see in the next version Visit our website for more Chromecast apps! http://beardcocoon.com Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/@BeardCocoon ** This game requires a Chromecast dongle **
release_text: - Fixed a bug where rotating your device would disconnect you from the Chromecast dongle.

description: Are you a master word chemist? Time to find out! Word Lab is a game for everyone! You have 90 seconds to use the letters on the grid, create words, and submit them for points. The longer the word, the higher the multiplier! Use some special powers cooked up by The Professor to aid you in your endeavor. How high can you score? Log in with your Facebook account to keep track of your score and to see how you rank amongst your friends. When you beat your friends' score, they will immediately see your triumph when they log in. Challenge yourself to see who can score the highest! Be informed who is on the top daily, weekly, and over all time. Play to earn coins, then use them to buy powers, skins, icons, and more. Word Lab is not your ordinary word game. It is the ultimate word game!

Here comes the new and improved Lola’s Fruity Sudoku! This classic game is now specially designed for kids ages 4 to 8. Attractive animated instructions help children get into the game easily and they can quickly learn to play even without knowing what Sudoku is. How is it possible that the game of Sudoku is playable by 4-year-old children, yet still challenging enough for 8-year-olds? It is in how the game has been designed: Lola’s Fruity Sudoku begins with an easy level for young children playing a 3x3 fruit game with three different types of fruit. The harder level, on the other hand, uses numbers and larger 4x4 grids, so it provides fun and challenges for children who are a bit older. Naturally, the game progresses smoothly from one level to the next, to help ensure that is it never too difficult for the player. The player is guided to help Lola Panda properly sort the fruit, depending on the difficulty level. After a few successes, a well-earned award is given which can be used at the end of the game when the Fruit Shop is ready to open. Like other Lola Panda games, Lola’s Fruity Sudoku has very clear instructions and pleasant voice for guidance. The renewed game consists of the following key features: - Animated and spoken instructions which are easy to follow - An easy 3x3 level with 3 different kinds of fruit - A medium 4x4 level with 4 different kinds of fruits - A hard level with numbers and bigger 4x4 grids - Possibility to help Lola in her Fruit Shop as an achievement reward Lola’s Fruity Sudoku provides loads of fun and develops children’s logical thinking! ******************* Check out our other popular Lola Panda™ games: - Lola's ABC Party - Lola's Math Train - Lola's ABC Party 2 - Lola's Math Train 2 - I Spy with Lola FOLLOW US on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lola_Panda LIKE US on Facebook: facebook.com/lolapanda ******************* What's New in this Version: Renewed game with new graphics *********************** Keywords kids,fun,panda,math,fruit,fruits,number,numbers,child,children,learn,easy,best,pre-school,games *********************

description: This App addresses European keyboard command compatibility issues found in Samsung Tablets when using @, € and # marks. This application will take the place of the current physical keyboard in your tablet, and must be set manually upon install. This is a bug fix and relates to the following keyboards: F5L146. Using the app in addition to your keyboard will allow you to use these and other marks. How to install Samsung Keyboard App • Download Belkin Keyboard Extension Kit App from the Play store • App will run automatically • Once installed go to the settings icon and click it • Scroll to “language and input” select • Under Keyboards and input methods • Under Default sub screen keyboards check the Belkin Character Extension (check mark) • Hit ok on pop up menu (we do not collect any data) • To the right of the App is a setting cog, click that and select your language, only choose one language • Hit back • Go to Default Keyboard and click the Belkin Character Extension • Complete Note: When Samsung tablets power down they revert to their native keyboard. If this happens, you will have to manually change your keyboard again.

We drive your car so you don’t have to! Enjoy your night out without worrying about how you’ll get home with our affordable designated driver service. Either reserve a personal driver beforehand or use our pickup service to get both you AND your car back safely. Why BeMyDD? - Two affordable options: Personal Driver Service - Reserve a BeMyDD driver to chauffeur you in your own car at a rate of $14.00-$19.50 per hour. Pickup Service - If you’ve already driven somewhere, two drivers will be dispatched to take you and your car back home for only $25.00 + mileage. - Professional drivers: Our rigorous screening process ensures excellent service from every driver we hire. From background checks to sending our drivers out in shirt and tie, our high standards ensure you get the service you deserve. All drivers must be 25 years or older and are fully insured. - Convenience and Safety: Serving over 76 cities in 31 states, BeMyDD is a convenient, safe alternative to drinking and driving. More efficient than struggling to find a taxi service and much more affordable than limousines, BeMyDD gives you access to a sober personal driver in just a few taps. Relax and enjoy being safely chauffeured from one local hot spot to the next in the comfort of your own car.

description: The first mobile game for kids to learn spoken mandarin. Kids can learn Chinese by playing Sun Wukong in the game, using magic spells to beat enemies. When casting a magic spell, kids must speak the magic word (Chinese words) aloud to the phone. If the pronunciation is accept, the magic spell will be successfully casted, and the magic effects will happen, -- in most cases, enemies are destroyed. To play the game, you must install a voice recognition package, we suggest the Google Voice Search. If you want the synthetic voice output, you must install a text to speech package which supports Chinese output. Features of this kids mandarin game: There are 41 levels in the game, each level has different tasks and puzzles. Children must speak Chinese to pass these levels. The words are grouped by Pinyin. It may help kids to learn how to pronounce other words with same Pinyin. Here is the link http://benbeninfo.com/games/learning-guide/ for additional learning materials. Providing a game scenario for kids to speak mandarin, to stimulate kids' interesting in learning Chinese. Player’s speech is automatically judged by voice recognizing software. You can know your speech capacity immediately. Learning to speak Chinese is no longer a boring task, you can using spoken Chinese to trigger magic, pass game levels, and get achievements. Many daily objects become magic spells in this kids learn mandarin game, kids may learn these words, and understand how to pronounce. Kids can learn many animals' Chinese name, and knowledge about food-chain in nature. Learning mandarin during fights in the fantasy world. Collecting dragon balls, to transform Sun Wukong in to the most powerful Chinese long. Children can challenge bosses by magic spells, and improving spoken mandarin in this kid mandarin game. If you think this kids learn Chinese game is useful, please consider buying the Ad. free version You are welcomed to contact us if you have any question about the game. Changed the name from "XiYouJi ZhouYuLiLiang" to "Kid mandarin Game" to make it easy for customers to find this speaking Chinese game.
release_text: Total 41 levels. The game will show recognition result by default. So that user can know what their voice sounds like. More levels to play, and more Chinese words for kids to learn.

Der Rest von uns muss sein Kurzzeit- und Langzeitgedächnits stetig trainieren, um einem schlechten Gedächtnis abhilfe zu schaffen. Geht es dir oft auch so, dass du dir manche Dinge partout nicht merken kannst? Bezeichnen dich deine Freunde und Verwandte gerne mal als Vergesslich? description: Сервис «Счет-фактура на проверке» сделает ваш смартфон прекрасным помощником в делах. Вы без труда проверите любой счет-фактуру и сможете во время исправить недочеты, на которые любят обращать внимание налоговики. Признание счет-фактуры недействительным по формальному признаку – обычная практика проверяющих. Любая мелочь в оформлении может послужить отказом в возмещении НДС. Проверка счет-фактуры никогда не будет лишней. В сервисе вы найдете: - «напоминалки» - формулировки, в которых нельзя ошибаться; - «примеры» - как правильно написать название компании, товар или услугу, единицу измерения и так далее; - ссылки на документы, в которых говорится о заполнении счет-фактур. Меньше минуты у вас уйдет на проверку. Вы сможете вовремя узнать, если что-то измениться в правилах заполнения счет-фактур. Сервис обновляется по мере изменения законодательства. Информационная поддержка сервиса: журнал для современного бухгалтера «Расчет», журнал «Практическая бухгалтерия», бератор «НДС от А до Я». Интернет-поддержка: www.buhgalteria.ru www.raschet.ru

Bergfex Weather App: All Bergfex - Weather forecasts in one app In this Weather App you get all weather forecasts from the Bergfex website for the Alps region (Austria, Germany, Switzerland, Italy and Slovenia), including Mountain weather forecasts. Exclusive for Austria: 3729 geo located and detailed weather forecasts for all towns and a large number of mountain weather forecasts. WIDGET INSTALLATION : to be able to add the widget to the home screen, the app must be installed on the intern memory and NOT on the SD-Card. You can move the app to the internal memory by following these steps: Settings -> Apps -> Bergfex Weather -> Move to internal memory What you get in the bergfex Weather App: - Favorite overview - 9 day forecasts (incl. detailed daily forecasts) - Temperatures (min./max.) - Wind - Precipitation (incl. rain quantity and possibility) - Sun hours - Precipitation forecast maps - Webcams The exact forecasts are produced in cooperation with the ZAMG (Zentralanstalt für Meteorologie und Geodynamik). You get access to the following extended contents by upgrading the app with an in-app purchase (1,79 €): - No ads - Weather radar images for rain/clouds and temperature in 15 minute updates (INCA forecast from ZAMG) - 14 day webcam archive with timelapse function - Detailed precipitation maps - Short hand forecasts (for all Locations in Austria) - Weather stations for Austria - Regional weather for Austria
release_text: Widget: Improved widget behaviour after device reboot Widget: Optimized update intervals V 1.14 Many optimisations Added snow values to the forecasts Added optional snow line (see Settings) WIDGET: because of a high demand by our users, we added a bergfex weather widget. You can add it on your home screen. See Description if you habe problems installing the widget. Weather radar images for rain/clouds and temperature in 15 minute updates (INCA forecast from ZAMG) - PRO

The goal is to fill the white squares with letters, forming words, by solving clues which lead to the answers. A great crossword puzzle free app for kids and adults. Improve your English vocabulary.

The Valhalla Golf Club App includes a GPS enabled yardage guide, 3D flyovers, live scoring and much more! Valhalla is the great hall of immortality in Norse mythology, the final resting place for heroes. In the world of golf, Valhalla has achieved similar status, playing host to the 78th and 82nd PGA Championships, the 65th Senior PGA Championship and the 37th Ryder Cup. The Gahm family (pronounced Game) enlisted Jack Nicklaus to design the course and construction began in 1984. In 1993, the Gahm family and the PGA of America formed a partnership allowing the PGA to eventually take ownership, which it did in 2000. Valhalla is no longer just a mythological shrine for Vikings.

Would you like improve your eyesight and get rid of glasses or tired eyes ? Do you have vision problems (Tired eyes, nearsightedness, farsightedness, headaches, eye strain,…) , are you just looking for eye health prevention from daily looking at a computer screen ? --- 48 HOURS TRIAL (If you decide dont want up we will refund you (Contact us on email)) --- We prepared 6 sets of exercises (from 3 to 20 minutes per training set), composed by best eye exercises from Vision therapy, Eye yoga, Bates methods and other eye recovery/training systems. Exercises were chosen to be as “discreet” as possible to outside world. You can discretely train during the regular day activities (waiting for train, …) or work activities (3/5 minutes training break during working day). Eye Doctor Trainer implements system of eye testing that record your current eyesight and allows you to track your recovery progress. You can retest you vision anytime and compare results with older records. Graph of training activity and eye test results serves for evaluating efficiency of length of training per vision correction. Eye Doctor Trainer cannot guarantee success of eye recovery, despite the fact that most people regularly training eye exercises are reporting successful results and at least partial improving of eyesight. 30-50% people refering 0.5 - 1.0 diopter recovery. (There is no magic in it – If you are training, your muscles are getting stronger and are working better). Take your glasses or lenses off before each training or eye test. If you feel any problems during the training rather stop and avoid training for few next days, if problems remains consult to your doctor. Be aware that all exercises are performed at one’s own risk. We hold no responsibility for using this exercises. Features planed to be additionally implemented to application: Eye relaxation training set Eye Yoga training set Bates methods training set Visual therapy training set Some of your suggestions Disorders that eye doctor could correct: Nearsightedness (Myopia) Farsightedness (Hyperopia), Astigmatism, Eye straining, Blurred or double vision, Redness, Irritation, Dryness Headaches

Flappy Forever takes the classic bird game and helps you train to get better. Hitting the pipes no longer kill you forcing you to restart the game. Starting and stopping gets annoying while playing, which is why I created Flappy Forever. In Flappy Forever, hitting a pipe will simply count up a negative score (And spit out a bunch of feathers!). The longer you are on the pipe, the more this goes up. The only way to die in this game is to hit the ground, allowing you to practice your flaps, Splashy Fish, Clumsy Bird, and Floppy Bird moves! This game is absolutely free and is coming soon to web and iOS. Future improvements to come!

description: Super Battery Bar is an easy to setup unobtrusive battery indicator. By placing a transparent bar over top of your status bar, it is easy to see the current battery percentage. The best part, is it is completely free! Some devices and Android versions don't have a clear indication of battery, which leaves you to guess. Simply downloading Super Battery Bar and enabling it will fix this problem. The default settings are perfect for most users, but further customization can be done depending on your requirements. Features: -Display battery percentage overtop of the bar -Customize the color, size and transparency -Charging color - Different color and options when the device is charging -Widget for easy control

Switches is a puzzle game where your goal is to turn all the switches off. What makes this difficult, is that changing the state of a switch will inverse the switches around it. Currently, this is just an experimental release. The Play button is disabled, as there is no "Story" mode yet. You can currently create your own level and publish them online, as well as view and play others. No score tracking or win counts are active. These will be done in a future release.

description: Quimidroid is the first application on the Android device's market which allows to formulate and name binary and ternary inorganic compounds. Its primary objective is to facilitate the learning of chemistry and become a pedagogical tool either individually or in school as a tool for self-correction. It also aims to expedite and streamline the development for professionals in the various fields that require such as medicine, health or even amateur people interested in chemistry. It should be added that the application is fully in english. Features: - Inorganic compounds formulation. - Binary: Hydrides, Oxides, peroxides and Binary salts. - Ternary: Hydroxides and Oxoacids. - Naming inorganic compounds. - Uses Stock and Systematic nomenclature recommended by IUPAC. - Molecular masses calculation. - Clear and intuitive graphical interface. - Periodic updates. - Installation to the SD card. IMPORTANT: New Quimidroid Pro version available without advertising! If our application is useful for you please help us continue improving it with our new Pro version that you can find on Google Play. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bfsmartcreative.quimidroidpro&hl=en_GB

description: Bible Book Order is a simple Bible Game that tests how well you know the order of the books of the Bible by having you pick which book comes first in a timed fashion. Two books of the Bible are scrolled onto the screen. You have to choose which book is first in the order that they occur in the Bible by pressing the button directly underneath that book. You have to get 10 correct answers which are called "matches" for each round within a certain amount of time. As you progress through the rounds, the time that you have to complete 10 matches becomes less and less, and the choice of books becomes more and more obscure. How fast can you make 10 matches? What round can you get to? Try this simple Bible Game and see that you will start to learn the order of the books of the Bible! Features: - Local storage of high scores! - Three game difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard ABOUT REQUIRED PERMISSIONS: - Internet Access: Bible Book Order! needs internet access for ads (which supports the development of Bible Book Order). - View Network State: Bible Book Order! checks if internet connection is up for ads. FIXED KNOWN ISSUES: - Text disappearing after wrong answer on some on Tablets and the Samsung Galaxy SIII -This has been fixed. If you have given a 1-star because of this, please consider re-reviewing. Thank you! KNOWN ISSUES: - There are still some crashes that occur. I am aware of this and am looking into it. Thank you for your patience!

The IBM Endpoint Manager Mobile Client enables you to securely connect your Android device to your organization’s network to receive email, recommended apps, and other services. Additionally, the app enables configuration of security settings to protect the organizational data on your device. To connect your device to your organization’s network, your administrator will need to provide you with a server URL, which you will enter during the enrollment process. This server URL, along with your email address, will be used to add your device to the organization’s mobile management system. Once enrolled, your organization can make available recommended apps which you can install from the IBM Endpoint Manager for Mobile Devices companion app. Additionally, to protect the organizational data on your device, the companion app checks to ensure your Android device hasn’t been compromised. --- To Uninstall IBM Mobile Client Before you uninstall the Mobile Client from Manage Applications, you must first perform the following steps: 1. Select Settings 2. Select Location and Security 3. Select Device Administrators 4. De-Select the check mark from IBM Endpoint Manager 5. Select Deactivate 6. Remove Mobile Client from Manage Applications

description: A Smarter You in 15 Minutes: Learn more, do more, be more - and still spend less time reading. We read 1,000 books a year for you and distill their key insights into powerful, actionable, 15-minute marvels. Blinkist is the quickest way to an even brighter you. + Learn the key insights from the best nonfiction books in just 15 minutes each + Stay up-to-date on ideas from top nonfiction in business, career, self-help, and more + Take your learning offline, online, and wherever you go – Blinkist is made for mobile + Listen to audio versions of our books or read them + Retain more and learn better – our format is scientifically designed for it ------------------------------------------- What you’ll get: ++ More than 800 books ++ From classics to the newest bestsellers, we’ve got more than 800 books in our library and add 40 new titles each month in both, audio and text. We cover the best business books on topics such as leadership, management or sales, the best self-help books on topics such as productivity, psychology, time management or health, as well as the best nonfiction books on topics such as economics, politics, current affairs, popular science or history. Whatever you want to learn, you’ll find it here. ++ Insights curated by true field experts ++ Our blinks are curated and written by people, not algorithms. Powered by experts with a passion for explaining complex matters in simple, beautiful language, our blinks are handcrafted and mindfully made. ++ Read & listen offline ++ Headed for the mountains, the beach, or just the plane? You don’t have to stop learning because you don’t have you can read & listen all the synced books in your library offline, too. How it works: Sign up for a free 3-day trial – no credit card required. We’ll find content tailored to your interests and you can start learning right away. Once your trial expires, just choose an upgrade that works for you: Blinkist Plus – $49.99 a Year Unlimited access to 500+ books, personalized recommendations, highlight and store your favorite insights, and read offline Blinkist Premium – $79.99 a Year All of the Plus features + audio versions of our books, a send-to-Kindle feature and the ability to sync your highlights with Evernote Should you choose not to upgrade, you will be limited to one pre-selected book-in-blinks per day. What others are saying about us: "Blinkist offers a terrific service – great ideas distilled down to their very essence. For those of us who are deeply curious about new ideas on success, happiness, innovation, progress and more, it’s a great start." - Forbes “Even if readers just use the summaries as quick shots of knowledge rather than as book discovery avenues, this could just mean they’re enriching otherwise lost time -- while driving, exercising, or doing chores -- rather than replacing real reading with the app” - The Huffington Post ------------------------------------------- Information Regarding Blinkist Plus & Premium Subscriptions Blinkist offers a free trial to new users. After expiration of the trial period, users can continue using Blinkist by subscribing to the service. We offer yearly subscriptions that allow users unlimited access to the Blinkist library. Payment will be charged via Google Wallet at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. To cancel a subscription, visit your “My subscriptions” page on Google Wallet and use the Cancel Subscription button. More information: Terms of Service: https://www.blinkist.com/en/privacy/#terms Privacy Policy: https://www.blinkist.com/en/privacy/#privacy

description: Help the Frogs to defend the valley! Shoot the tongue, eat bugs, avoid dangers and defeat the Rats! Version without Advertising. The Croak Valley is threaten by a terrible angry enemy, who wants to conquer it fighting off the Frogs. Shoot the tongue in the air to grab the bugs and hit the enemies. Explore the pond to find new insects. Use the magic fruits to gain new powers and pass over the four seasons unharmed, defeating the dangerous Bosses who will fight hard to block you. Breed the frogs and defeat their enemies. Now Scoreloop Leaderboards available! Challenge on-line your friends on level 9 and earn coins! Scale up the Scoreloop leaderboards: global, daily, friends. A Frog's Tale is a game of skill and speed. You'll have to face 45 different levels through the Croack Valley and the four seasons, overcoming rain, snow, night wars and more! The score will depend on the time passed and the combo you'll achieve. Challenge yourself to gain the three stars and scores higher and higher! Increase your shooting prowess, toss the tongue. During the game you'll receive different powers, as the double tongue or the slow motion time to help you in your quest to defend the Valley. Nevertheless, your enemies will contrive new ways to impede you, like thorny branches and tadpoles kidnapping! Help the angry frogs fighting against flies, wasps, ants, worms, crickets, fireflies, butterflies, spiders, mosquitos, bees, dragonflies, snakes and rats. Breed the frogs and their tadpoles, help them to defend the pond.

Household Budget - is a powerfull and user-friendly application for home bookkeeping that takes care about your family budget. Simply add your payments and program will automatically calculate your balance. You can easily find your balance for any date. Just add your expenses and incomes and see how much money you will have. You can also build different charts for any period. Charts can be linear or circle. Supports currencies, accounts, categories and subcategories. Usefull calendar on the main screen. Photo attachments. Password protection. Export to CSV. Data backup and restore. Different themes. No ADS or advertisement. This makes this app so usefull and convenient. And Bluetooth synchronization helps you to keep family budget in your hands. Supported languages: english and russian. Save your money with Household Budget!

description: اقوال وحكم ستغير حياتك هي اقوال حكيمة من لنخبة الفلاسفة والمفكرين والحكماء والكتاب والمصلحين والقادة ورجال الاعمال .هي اقوال حكيمة تشكل خلاصة تجارب تغني عن قراءات مجلدات تلهم القارىء وترشده في سعيه الدؤوب نحو مستقبل ناجح وحياة افضل . اقوال وحكم وامثال رائعة للمشاركة كرسائل ومسجات للفيس بوك وتويتر والواتس اب. من اقوال وحكم فولتير السر في كونك شخصا مثيرا للملل ، هو أنك تقول كل شي. من اقوال وحكم أندريه شينيه إننا نطيل الكلام عندما لا يكون لدينا ما نقوله. من اقوال وحكم ستيف جوبز اجعل البساطة هي التي تحكم. من اقوال وحكم الإمام علي بن أبي طالب استغنِ عمن شئت تكن نظيره، واحتج إلى من شئت تكن أسيره، وأحسن إلى من شئت تكن أميره. من اقوال وحكم ايرل ولسون الشجاعة الحقة في أن تكون الرجل الوحيد الذي يعرف أنه خائف. من اقوال وحكم مالكوم إكس لقد تعلمت باكراً أن الحق لا يُعطى لمن يسكت عنه، وأن على المرء أن يحدث بعض الضجيج حتى يحصل على ما يريد. من اقوال وحكم بنجامين فرانكلين كن بطيئا في أختيار الصديق وأبطأ في تبديله. من اقوال وحكم توماس إديسون العبقرية عبارة عن واحد بالمئة إلهام و99 بالمئة بذل مجهود. من اقوال وحكم شارلي شابلن تأتي الفكره عن طريق الرغبه الشديدة. من اقوال وحكم علي بن ابي طآلب ازرع جميلاً ولو في غير موضعه فلن يضيعُ جميل أينما صُنع إن الجـميــل إذا طـــال الزمـان بـه فليس يحصده إلا الذي زرع من اقوال وحكم عمرو بن العاص الانسان حيث وضع نفسه فان وضعها اتضعت وان رفعها ارتفعت. من اقوال وحكم سنيكا رأيك بنفسك أهم من رأي الآخرين فيك. من اقوال وحكم جلاسو التصفيق هو الوسيلة الوحيدة التي نستطيع أن نقاطع بها أي متحدث دون أن نثير غضبه. من اقوال وحكم أرسطو سئل أرسطو من يصنع الطغاة؟ فرد قائلا ضعف المظلومين. من اقوال وحكم ستيف جوبز الأداة الجبارة التي تساعدني دائما على اتخاذ القرارات المصيرية في حياتي هي إدراكي بأنني سأموت. من اقوال وحكم ستيف جوبز ساعد وحمس الأشخاص الذين يريدون أن يفعلوا شي مميز في الحياة. من اقوال وحكم ألبرت انيشتاين يستطيع أي أحمقٍ جَعل الأشياء تبدو أكبر وأعقد، لكنك تحتاج إلى عبقري شجاع لجعلها تبدو عكس ذلك. من اقوال وحكم قاسم أمين لا تكمل أخلاق المرء إلا إذا استوى عنده مدح الناس وذمِّمهم إياه. من اقوال وحكم هنري فورد إن التفكير أصعب الأعمال وهذا هو السبب في أن القليلين هم الذين يختارونه كعمل من اقوال وحكم الفيلسوف الفرنسي لاروشفركو إذا أردت أن تخلق الأعداء فتميز على أصدقائك أما إذا شئت أن تكسب الأصدقاء فدع أصدقاءك يتميزون عليك. من اقوال وحكم بنجامين فرانكلين الأسباب الصغيرة لها غالبا نتائج كبيرة ، فقدان المسمار اضاع حدوة الحصان وفقدان الحدوة اضاع الحصان ،وفقدان الحصان اضاع الفارس. من اقوال وحكم زينوبيوس تدوم الصداقة طالما القدر يغلي . من اقوال وحكم أينشتاين ليست الفكرة في أني فائق الذكاء، بل كل ما في الأمر أني أقضي وقتاً أطول في حل المشاكل. من اقوال وحكم أوسكار وايلد لا تعتبر السعادة سعادة إلا إذا إشترك فيها أكثر من شخص. من اقوال وحكم بل جيتس ليس خطأك ان تولد فقيرا, ولكنه خطؤك ان تموت فقيرا. من اقوال وحكم إسحاق نيوتن ان هذا النظام الدقيق والكواكب والشهب لا يمكن أن ينبثق الا عن حكمة وهيمنة خالق قادر. من اقوال وحكم إسحاق نيوتن إنني جاهل، لا أعرف إلا حقيقة واحدة ، وهي أنني لا أعرف شيئاً. من اقوال وحكم إسحاق نيوتن الكياسة هي فن صنع هدف من دون صنع أعداء. اقوال وامثال وحكم ستغير حياتك تطبيق رائع حمله على جوالك.

Simple battery widget. Clicking on the widget opens the battery usage statistics. Depending on the condition of the battery shows 4 colors: - Green - 31-100% - Orange - 16-30% - Red - 0-15% - Blue - charging It is possible to display the temperature of the battery in C or F. Get instant access to global business and finance news, market data and portfolio tracking tools from the world's most trusted source. Personalize the information that matters to you most and access it instantly. News: - Access breaking news and top stories from over 45 categories including Economy, Technology, Politics, Personal Finance, Bonds, Commodities, Currencies, Emerging Markets, Funds, Energy Markets and many more. - Get the latest news on companies in your Watchlist and on key events in the business world such as the Debt Crisis, Elections, Davos, G8, Earnings etc. Market Data: - Get the latest market data for global Equity Indexes, Bonds, Futures, Commodities & Currencies. - Personalize the markets that are most important to you and get instant access to them. Watchlist: - Track, manage and analyze your personal holdings (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies etc.) with powerful performance charts, including summary visualizations by Asset Type, Industry & Location. - Access detailed company pages that include key statistics, financials and earnings updates. Tools & Visualizations: - Get an instant snapshot of how the world markets that are important to you are performing by personalizing the command center on the home screen. - Utilize analytical tools to better understand how companies and markets have performed. S-Pen/Air-view Features: - Hover over headlines to see article previews - Hover over tickers within news articles for the latest market data on your tablet - Annotate and save your notes within Bloomberg+ on your tablet Video: - Watch Live Bloomberg TV, customized for your region of the world or select a different region for a new perspective - Choose top videos from the home page, news sections or from within articles. - Use the portable HD video player to watch videos uninterrupted, while browsing the app. Audio: - Listen to insightful interviews and analysis from the smartest names in Finance, Business, Economics & Investment. Slideshows: - View slideshows and photo galleries that highlight the latest news from around the world. Other Features: - Access the latest stock price and news for companies, people and topics mentioned in articles - Synchronize your Watchlist with Bloomberg.com and also access it via the web - Share articles using Email, Facebook or Twitter - Search for news and stock quotes - Adjust font size and contrast within news articles to maximize readability

The app for the fans, by the fans, of the fans who love Idol –Fandom! Haven’t you heard?! Ten million people are already using this app- Fandom! You can find out about Idol through Fandom, talk with fans from all over the world and also feel like Idol is greeting you personally through your lock screen! Cheer Them On You can share pictures with other fans, send messages of encouragement to the star, talk with him or her and also see all of the star’s social networking accounts such as Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram- without logging in! View Pictures There are many unique features such as stars’ photos and albums, which you can share with your friends or your special someone. The daily pictures are diverse and varied, and you can also save directly and share these pictures with your friends! View Schedule Don’t miss a minute of your favorite star’s schedule. Fans can edits stars’ schedules and create their own! You’ve never experienced anything like this before! Fans can directly upload information such as reruns, broadcasts, signing events and so on. So you’ll know virtually everything about your idol’s schedule! View Video Of course, you can watch your star’s music video, in addition to many variety and television shows! Album list You can listen to all of your favorite star’s music and albums! Interactive Lock Screen Complete the app with your name and picture! Every morning the app will call your name and ask you, “Did you sleep well?” In the evening, it says “I miss you” . With Fandom, you’ll have something to look forward to at any time of day. Alternate Lock Screen Instead of your favorite star’s photo, you can also insert photos or your boyfriend or girlfriend, pets or friends and use the lock screen So, how about starting Fandom today? ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Question and Feedback E-mail : help@bluemoon.io Tweeter : https://twitter.com/star_fandom Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/io.bluemoon.fandom Kakao Story Channel : https://story.kakao.com/ch/idolfandom Naver blog : http://blog.naver.com/idolfandom

Intercept the enemy forces before they reach your base. Balance your attack and defence to achieve the ultimate victory! Take some old-school Missile Command style gameplay. Sprinkle in some Flight Control style line-drawing, add a little bit of wave defence and voilà! Missile Control! Stop landing those planes and start blowing them up! Flip the ‘line drawing’ genre on its head and draw the paths for your missiles directly. Path them to intercept an incoming missile or enemy supply plane or perhaps punch through the defensive lines and take out the silos directly. Battle through the missions to unlock more regions and missile types. Each region provides a unique layout and objective. Choose from a variety of unique missile types. Each with special features. Take out multiple enemies with a nuke or teleport through defensive lines to target specific units. Defending your base can be stressful! Find yourself in a tight spot? Then press the big red button and nuke em all! *** CHALLENGE MODE *** Mastered the existing regions? Try for high scores in the challenge mode maps for each region. Survive the un-ending enemy assault as long as possible! *** FEATURES *** - Touch screen controls to draw paths for your missiles to follow. - Different missile variants all with unique after-touch effects. Boost, divide, teleport and nuke your way to victory! - Protect your supply planes to gain bonus credits and super weapons. - Super weapons available! Collect them in game or purchase them at the store. - Multiple game modes. - Battle over various geographic regions and complete specific mission objectives. - Mission based high scores. - Build combos to increase score generation. - Same-Screen Multiplayer! *** THE DEVELOPER *** This is the first game from the two man team at Blunt Instrument Studios! We're completely independent and love what we do. Enjoy! We will be sure to provide additional content in future patches! Keep an eye out. ****

This makes it a bit quicker to unlock everything. ** Version 1.0.13 ** - Bug fixes - There are no level restrictions anymore. Free to unlock any region at any time (with enough credits) - The back button will now quit the game

What do women want? This is a question that has baffled men since the beginning of time and we men are no closer to understanding women than we were when we huddled around an open fire every night and lived in caves. Why are women so hard to decipher? Simply because we try to understand them from a man’s point of view without understanding the basic premise that women think differently from men. In fact, women have completely different wiring than men and we will never be able to understand them on a logical level, which is how we approach most everything. Think about it. What do we do when we get together for some fun? We definitely aren’t sharing feelings. No, we drink, talk about sports and other apparently innocuous subjects which in fact are a hidden form of competition. You know, the mine’s bigger than yours syndrome. However, for guys this is absolutely natural. On the other hand, when women get together they share their feelings, they watch chick flicks and talk about the latest diet or article in Cosmo. You see, women are mainly driven by emotion. Just as we need logic and structure in our lives, they need emotion. Men thrive on competition, adrenaline, power, domination, while women couldn’t really care less about them. The idea is that if you really want to be able to date any girl, no matter how attractive she is, you need to know what drives her, what her underlying motives are. Now, don’t take this the wrong way because many women have no conscious idea of what drives them or what their motives are; it’s just the way nature has wired them. However, just as you need to know what drives her, you need to stop worrying about it making sense. It is never going to make sense to us because we see things differently. But, if you know what her buttons are then you will be able to play sweet music that she won’t be able to resist. Remember knowledge is power and you like power, don’t you? Well, learn what drives women and then you will have it in spades.

Happy New Year! It may have stopped snowing but some exciting updates are coming soon, keep walking! ---- Monty Python invites you to join that British bastion of eccentric loco-motion - The Ministry of Silly Walks Your assignment as a member of this venerable organisation is to showcase your increasingly frantic promenading as far as you possibly can. Bank coins and collect power ups to help take your walk to new heights of silliness. • Warning! description: ***THIS IS NOT THE GAME--THIS IS A DIGITAL COMPANION TO THE CALL OF DUTY: GHOSTS VIDEO GAME*** This official multiplayer map app provides detailed layouts of all the MP maps. Get the drop on your opponents with this easy-to-use map reference and learn the layout of all the maps inside and out! Memorize the location of all the key items and take your online experience to the next level. Plus, check out the all-new weapon range markers! Utilize these interactive indicators to determine the optimal firing range for Shotguns, Submachine Guns, Assault Rifles, Light Machineguns and Marksman Rifles. Drag the markers all around the map to find the optimal firing range. All 14 multiplayer maps included Easily toggle between all the MP gameplay modes Interactive weapon range markers! Callouts and key locations identified for each gameplay mode

Note: This is not the game, but instead a digital companion to the game. The Dishonored Official Map App is the perfect companion to the game. This app allows players to find and track the hidden collectibles in the game. Detailed maps from each area in the game pinpoint the location of all the Books, Outsider Shrines, Bone Charms, Sokolov's Paintings and Runes. Plus the handy tracking tool allows players to mark which ones they've found and which ones are still outstanding.

THIS IS NOT THE GAME--THIS IS A DIGITAL STRATEGY COMPANION TO THE GAME. The official SAINTS ROW 4 Map App is the perfect digital companion to the game. This app is the best source to find every Data Cluster and reveals the location of every collectible including: Audio Logs, Zinyak Statues and Text Adventures!! In addition, each map district details various points of interest like businesses and gateways. Plus, the in-game tracking ability provides an easy-to-use method to track which items have been found.

THIS IS NOT THE GAME—THIS IS A DIGITAL STRATEGY COMPANION TO THE GAME. The perfect digital companion to Skylanders SWAP Force, this handy app allows gamers to track and find all the collectibles in the game! This interactive app will add another layer of excitement to your gaming experience! The Skylanders SWAP Force Official Map App provides players with expertly crafted area maps complete with icons indicating the exact location of every cool collectible. This app covers the following: *Hats *Legendary Treasures *Bonus Mission Maps *Story Scrolls *Soul Gems *Treasure Chests *Winged Sapphires Each collectible is precisely placed on the maps, serving as an easy quick reference resource that can be used while playing the game. Don’t let any collectible go unfound!

SNAPmail is a tablet app that provides an easy and convenient way of taking pictures and videos. A preview feature allows the user to decide which pictures or videos to e-mail or upload to a social media website. The picture or video may also be saved to an external memory card. The user can specify a delay before the picture or video is taken. A variety of color effects are provided to modify the camera image. The app was designed and tested for Android 3.0.
release_text: Added color effects dialog. Export of pictures/videos.

In your space galaxy you will find many powers like Electric Shield, Bombs and many more. so Guardian you need to collect stars also to make your own high score. Doodle Colouring Book is an exciting colouring and doodling game for kids and toddlers. It comes packaged with various colouring themes that will spark your children's imagination and engage them to doodle for hours. To make full use of your child's creativity, Doodle Colouring Book comes with a perfect set of familiar tools such as coloured pencils, brushes, marker pens and even a magic bucket. In addition, creations can be decorated with a collection of beautiful and fun stickers. We have created beautiful HD colouring themes for boys and girls, appropriate for kids of different ages - from toddlers to early teenagers. Doodle Colouring Book is the perfect canvas to bring out the hidden artist in your child. Intuitive touch screen interface requires no learning – you can begin drawing, doodling, painting or colouring instantly! Thanks to a simple design, nothing will stay in the way of your child’s creativity. No matter what a child's skill level is – the magic bucket can always save the day. Every brilliant creation can be stored to a photo gallery or easily shared with friends via e-mail. Allow your child to join the colourful journey into the world of digital canvas. Features: • Doodling with tips of your fingers • Familiar colouring tools (markers, coloured pencils, brushes) • Various colouring themes • Beautiful HD illustrations • A set of fun stickers • Intuitive interface • Appropriate for children of all ages

The good old classic bubble popping game Bubble Hunt is a fun and entertaining game that will keep you interested for hours on end. Select bubbles with the same color and let them burst. The more you break with one click, the higher the score you get. First select a group of bubbles then break them with a click. You can play challenges against other player Features: * Highly addictive & Hours of fun * Simple but great UI * Challenges * Multiple bubble colors support (4-6) * Undo and Redo moves * High score board. * Heyzap integration * Global / Local scores KW: bubble, bobble, burst, buster, explode, hunt, pop, popper, break, Jawbreaker, Bubblets, Bubblet, Bubble Breaker, Bubble Hunt

Budge Studios™ presents Miss Hollywood™, the fabulous new pet series! Miss Hollywood and her fashionable furry friends are all strays with a dream: to be the pet they were destined to become. Adopt these stylish pets today so you can dress, groom, play, feed – and make their dreams come true! FEATURES • 5 unique pets, each with their own quirky personality and style! • The more you take care of them, the happier they get! • Dress them up in a variety of snazzy outfits and accessories! • Shampoo, rinse, and blow-dry their fur! • Feed your pets all kinds of yummy treats! • Play entertaining games and activities! • Take photos and give them the star treatment! • Tablet compatible! MEET THE PETS • Miss Hollywood – This fashionable socialite Chihuahua is destined for stardom and diamond-studded tiaras! • Miss Puggy – This prima donna pug is a glamour gal who fancies dance parties and truffle biscuits! • Princess –This feline first lady is a sophisticated Persian cat who longs for nothing more than a royal spa treatment! • Sport – This young goofy mutt is incredibly energetic and wants to play sports and games! • B-Dawg –This rugged and tough Boston terrier aspires to become a Hip Hop DJ and chew expensive bones! Get things done with Taskary for Google Tasks and To-do list management. Includes full sync with multiple accounts. Use due dates and times for tasks, order your tasks, star important tasks and set location based reminders. Use the agenda view to keep track of your tasks and calendar now with agenda widget. ★★ Features ★★ • Google Tasks sync including background sync and multiple account switching • Create tasks and to-do lists • Set due date and time • Custom reminder time • Reminder notifications including Snooze and Postpone functions • Drag to reorder tasks in a list • Assign Contacts and photos to a task • Search across all task descriptions and notes • Repeating tasks (Daily, Weekly(select multiple days), Day of Month, Week of Month, Day of Year) • Say 'Note to self' into Google Now to create a task • Location based task notifications, set a location with a task for a reminder when phone is near by • Easy month view date picker • Star important tasks, view all starred items in virtual list • Agenda view for tasks with a due date/time • optionally show calendar events in agenda (Android 4.0 and above) and select which calendars to show • Ad free for first 3 days use (Paid Ad free upgrade available) • All/Later virtual task lists • Scrollable Agenda Widget with add button • Categories widget for today/starred/later/completed lists • Dual pane screen layout for tablets Paid upgrade features include removal of ads, set task durations with start and due date and overdue task list. Note: please email for support and feature requests.
release_text: Version 1.5.2 - Fix issue with dark menu on Android Lollipop - Improved location maps, search by location name - Select agenda day to scroll to days tasks/events - Minor bug fixes Version 1.5.1 - Fix issue with Agenda view crashing with repeating tasks - Fix issue with setup process crashing - Fix issue with attaching contacts for a task - Fix Agenda layout on tablets Version 1.5 - Fix various issues - Layout improvements - Some performance improvements

description: Join Lily as she flees the cursed lair of the horrible demon Grûûl. Use the exceptional agility and extraordinary abilities of an amazon to run as far as possible! Jump from hill to hill, go around the creatures of the forest and destroy them using your destructive powers. After the King of the Fairies died, the infamous Grûûl took power and reigned in terror. See through the demon's designs and discover the plot lurking in the depths of the magic forest! In the game, you collect coins, complete missions, and win trophies to gain new abilities. Develop extraordinary leaping abilities or strengthen your destructive powers, then hurtle back into the race! Detailed graphics, humor, hours of gameplay and easy to understand. Every second of the game calls for precision, sharp reflexes, agility, and powerful spells. The game also contains parts of trophies to win, animals to save, rare coins to collect, and a really cute amazon. Praised by the critics for the excellent controls. Discover the runner of the year! Buy Little Amazon and dive into its captivating universe. Developed with love by cTools Studio - check out the made-in-France talent of a brand new studio! This game features: Hours of races (a real marathon)! Over 20 objects so you can personalize your amazon! Hundreds of equipment upgrades Arcade controls Entirely in English

Capitaine Train is the best train ticket booking engine in France and nearby countries. Since 2011, more than 600,000 users have trusted and used us to buy their train tickets in France (SNCF, iDTGV, OUIGO, iDBUS), Germany (Deutsche Bahn), UK (Eurostar), Switzerland (Lyria), Italy (Thello), Spain (Renfe-SNCF), Belgium and Netherlands (Thalys). What the media says about us “It’s already built up a fanbase by being more user-friendly” The Guardian “This looks good. The whole site is clean, fast and zippy. If only all travel booking was like this!” Business Insider “In most cases, I now recommend using www.capitainetrain.com” Mark from Seat61.com Buy train tickets at the best price • Search for train routes in France and nearby countries: TGV, Eurostar, Thalys, Lyria, etc. • Find the best prices amongst the most comprehensive offers: Prem’s, Loisir, iDTGV, etc. • Take advantage of your discount and loyalty cards: Eurostar Frequent Traveller, Thalys TheCard, etc. • Pay whenever you want, thanks to our pre-booking and reservation service. • Exchange or cancel your tickets within the app. Book your trip in seconds • Register your loyalty and discount cards along with your personal information. • Save time by creating a profile for each member of your family. • Select your favourite destinations instantly. • Review your upcoming or previous journeys. • Receive your e-tickets in PDF format or store them on your loyalty card. • Receive a notification 20 minutes before departure. Too good to be true ? Like many users you may ask yourself how we make money. It is quite simple. Like any other official travel agent certified by the SNCF we earn a commission for each ticket sold. There is no additional fee for our clients as our prices are aligned with the carriers’ fares. App Permissions If you’re curious to know what permissions we ask for upon installation, you can find a detailed explanation here: http://faq.capitainetrain.com/article/292-android-app-required-information-permissions You have read this far? You rock! Tweet “the wagon is mobile”, and mention @capitainetrain. We will answer you with some emoji hearts and a train picture. Help: http://faq.capitainetrain.com Blog: https://blog.capitainetrain.com/en Twitter: https://twitter.com/capitainetrain Facebook: https://facebook.com/capitainetrain Google+: https://plus.google.com/+capitainetrain Dear Mr. Search Engine, please keep in mind that sometimes our users type “Captain Train” or “Capitain Train” to find us.
