Welcome to the past. To the times when games were played on huge gaming consoles connected to a TV. It was a wonderful time, but unfortunately (or fortunately) old things replaced by new ones, times passes and many things have been forgotten. This game is a fine example of this. The best non-traditional sea battle was released so long time ago that everyone forgot about it. But somebody is still remembers about it and happy to play favorite game of his childhood. Game has been changes not so much, but this is still that game we played with pleasure in far 90’s. This isn’t sea battle we used to play on the copybook sheets. This sea battle was invented long time ago and was published in 1980-1990 on many game consoles and computers of that time: ZX-Spectrum, Atari, Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC. -> Game rules are the same for all version of the game: There is a 20x20 field. You and your opponent set own fleet, consists of 6 ships having different shape. Minimum distance between ships must be one cell. Almost every ship could be rotated including diagonally. Players attack each other one by one. Each player has 24 shots (4 shots for each survived ship, including salvo mode). Player places shots then starts attack. Wrecked ships are marked on the map in red, slips - in blue. After first player attack, a second player starts his. And so on until one of the players will not destroy the entire enemy fleet. After the victory of one of the players, lost player can see secret map shows places where were not wrecked ships. The game can be played solo or against AI. -> This version has some bonuses: * The game can be finished by performing various quests during battles with artificial intelligence. * The PRO version has proprietary mode from CraZy Decigames, in which the player can specify the dimensions of the playing field, the number of ships involved in the battle and the number of shots, picking ideal game for himself.

Word Complete is an easy to play english spell game that helps you to learn correct spelling of the words in a playful way. Word Complete let's you to check how great your spelling skills are and also how quickly you can spell the words. In this game a word will be shown on a board with one or two letters missing. All you have to do is select the missing letter/letters from the options given below the board as quickly as possible to complete the word. It comes with four interesting game modes. *** Arcade Mode - It is a standard classic mode where you will be given ten words to complete. For each word you have maximum 10 seconds. Try to complete the word as fast as possible to get better score (The left time adds to your score). *** Survival Mode - As name suggests, it may become an endless gameplay if someone is really good at spelling otherwise it will end when a total of five mistakes are committed in the game. In this mode also 10 seconds are given to complete each word. ***Time Attack - This one is a classic beast. Here your mind intuition and reflexes come into play. You will be given 60 seconds to complete as much words as you can. Beware - Wrong answer will affects the score. ***Learn Mode - Here you will be free from any restriction and your main aim becomes to learn the spellings. Complete as many words as you want to then hit stop button to end game. Error List also display all your errors without having to go premium. There is no scoring involved in this mode. Word complete consists of two difficulty modes - Easy and Hard. In these modes either a single or two letters would be missing. Hard mode seems difficult, play this mode to get higher score (scoring is different in both modes). ***Whats more*** **Google play leaderboard: To share your score with friends and family. *Has three Separate leaderboards for the three different game modes. **Correct Spelling List : The main aim of this game is to help the users to increase their spelling skills, so after the game is completed it shows the list of correct spellings of the words that the user entered wrong. ** Achievements are also added which are unlocked by progressing the game. ** now share your stats with your friends and family on gmail, whatsapp, twitter etc. This game also includes in-app purchases to remove ads and to remove restrictions on your error list.
release_text: * New game mode added - Learn Mode. * new Achievement added. * Improved word List.

Police Scanner Radio brings you more than 2,500 police, fire, rescue and other radio feeds over 3G or WiFi. You can search for channels in the U.S. and other countries by country, state or province and county. Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G/WiFi triangulation. You can save your favorites, listen in the background, and get instant access to new feeds as they come online. Use it to monitor exciting police, fire, and rescue frequencies, stay abreast of these activities in your area, and be prepared for disasters or other emergency situations. ◆ It's like Jersey Shore, but not really. ◆ Whether you like reality shows or hate them, you'll love listening in on real police, fire and rescue communications. Police Radio brings you more than 2,000 channels including public safety, air traffic, marine and amateur short-wave frequencies, all easily searchable. ◆ Find sources close to you. ◆ When you could hear your neighbors yelling over your own TV, you knew what they were up to. It's when they suddenly got quiet that you had to wonder. No more! With Police Radio, you'll know as soon as the authorities do! ◆ Never boring! ◆ Find channels with the most activity and listeners. Search U.S. feeds by state and county. Also search international feeds. Roger, Porkchop. Whut's yer 20? Learn new words, and new ways of combining familiar words. We were going to list this in the Education category, but everyone laughed. So here it is in this category. Seriously, though, check out the features: Critical Hit Software LLC makes no claim of any kind about the availability of any specific communications channel, frequency or data feed. Feeds are added and removed from time to time outside the control of Critical Hit Software LLC. Please see http://criticalhitsoftware.com/scanner_feeds.php for a sample list of feeds. FEATURES ✔ More than 2,500 radio feeds delivered to you over 3G or WiFi ✔ Simple, intuitive screens ✔ Search U.S. and international channels by country, state and county ✔ Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G triangulation ✔ Save your favorite channels ✔ Listen in the background as you use other apps ✔ Get instant access as new feeds come online

description: Diet Watchers Diary is the ultimate all in one WW Type app - Food Value Calculators + Built in Values list's + Diary management! Application guide lines is that Mobile App should be simple, effective ,stable and fast. we are here to help accomplish the really hard mission of losing that extra weight. ✔ Dropbox integration - keep your backups on the cloud ✔ Click2Sync - Single click to sync between your mobile and Tablet - (using dropbox) ✔ Food Value Calculators for Classic Plans (Flex & Momentum) and Plus / Pro methods ✔ BMI Calculator ✔ Food Value lists with several thousands of records which will continue to grow Languages with points lists: German (Classic & Pro) French (Classic & Pro & Pro 2.0) English (Classic & Pro /Plus) Dutch ( Classic & Pro ) Spanish ( Classic & Pro) Portuguese ( Classic & Pro 2.0 & System C) ✔ Light or Dark theme UI. ✔ Meal \ Recipe Creator - define your meal using other food items . ✔ Track various health recommendations on daily basis , such as liquids , healthy oils and more... You can add your own recommendations. ✔ Mark your most common foods as Favorites and easily select those to deduct from your daily budget. ✔ Plenty of widgets to accommodate your needs ✔ Weekly points management, Points bank feature along with Simply Filling technique. ✔ Backup and restore application data. ✔ Weight tracker with good looking charts to monitor your weight loss progress & BMI values ✔ Daily Points Allowance calculators (For all systems supported) ✔ Activity points calculator (by weight ,intensity and duration) ✔ Share your personal favorites list with other Weight Watchers team members. If you have your own personal excel sheet with points list send it to me and I will convert it to the application format. ✔ Export Daily Diary - including all the details, to mail as text file, HTML file to be used in the weekly meetings. ✔ Email for support from Settings window Good luck on your diet!!! Disclaimer: Diet Watchers Diary is not a weight-loss program in and of itself, but a tool for you to use with a weight-loss program that you are already involved with. It does not provide you with all the intimate details of determining certain aspects of any weight-loss program. It assumes you are already involved with a weight-loss program. Please consult your health care provider for any health concerns This application is not affiliated with nor endorsed by any company including Weight Watchers ™ which is a registered trademark.
release_text: 1. Added support for Simply filling days 2. Added Body mass index calculator and added BMI charts display 3. Brand new widgets added - including 1*1 and a larger resizable widget with weight and Health recommendations information 4. Added option to select which Bonus points to use first - Activity or Weekly 5. Daily Diary colorings - Markup your meals according to time. 6. History save for Healthy Recommendations - Exported to files as well 7. Various UI improvements & bug fixes

description: Once upon a time kids used their imagination to venture to far off lands full of castles, dragons, princesses and brave knights. Fast forward to today and youngsters are dreaming of epic battles aboard spaceships, the impending zombie apocalypse and magical realms populated by fantastical beings. Now they can harness all that creative energy and bring their favorite sagas to life with StoryBook Studio. No matter the genre, StoryBook provides the platform kids need to set their imagination free. Choose a setting from the 21 backgrounds and add details using the design elements in your tool box. Build a castle, raise a barn or design a city of the future. Everything is resizable and can be personalized using the virtually unlimited combinations of color choices, clothing, accessories and shapes. Whether your child favors classic fairy tales set in idyllic, flower-strewn meadows or the gritty edge of a barren dystopian world, StoryBook provides everything kids need for enhanced storytelling. Elaborate book trailers with live action and narration, stylized, animated cartoons and modern fairy tales with a happily ever after ending are just a few of the projects kids can develop and share. Features: • Multiple backgrounds with site specific environmental sounds • Scrolling library of building parts and vegetation to add to scenes • Complete line up of fairy tale characters • Mix and match clothing and accessories • Dozens of shapes to combine into unique objects • Editing tools including flipping, copying, resizing and mirroring elements • Record original narration and custom sound effects • Direct live action stories with animated characters and objects • Learn to direct through interactive tutorials Whether they’re making dolphins flip or battling an ogre, every child is a star with Storybook Studio. If you enjoy StoryBook Studio, try more of our fun learning apps for kids: •Build and Play 3D - Planes, Trains, Robots and More •Build and Play - Rockets, Helicopters, Submarines and More •3D Sketch and Stretch Studio •Fairytale Sort and Stack - Princesses, Knights, Dragons and More About Croco Studio: Croco Studio is an award-winning team of parent developers intent on creating apps that kids adore and parents trust. Our apps provide a safe playing environment without ads or unprotected external links. At Croco Studio we create apps that encourage kids to learn the fun way. Please contact us with feedback at WeListen@crocostudio.com . We’d love to hear from you.

You will be amazed by the toys your little builders can put together in 3D! Balloons, UFOs and planes, cars, bikes and trains, ships, subs or jet ski! Once built they will take you in the air, on the ground or into the sea. If aeronautical engineering sounds a bit advanced even for your bright young tot, have no fear. The models automatically rotate to help kids find the proper placement for each piece. They can’t mess up because parts don’t snap in place until they are correct. These models won’t be crashing or sinking for lack of a rotor or wheel. The best part is that kids’ hard work is rewarded because their designs come to life when complete. The flying, floating, puffing and puttering machines that belch smoke and make satisfying rumbles will delight youngsters. Children can choose their favorites from the twelve included toys or let the game decide for them using the intuitive controls. App includes: · Fifteen classic toys in bright primary colors – UFO, hot air balloon, jet ski, airplane, car, cement mixer, motorbike, ship, train, crane, digger, monster truck, firetruck and robots. · Easily sliding pieces perfect for children with still developing fine motor control · Option to mute background music and/or sound effects. · Language neutral for universal appeal · Child-safe, protected environment Croco Studio believes in learning through play and this app subtly presents a number of age appropriate educational concepts. Children are introduced to left/right, top/bottom and back/front as they spin their models to find where pieces go. They also achieve a basic understanding of symmetry and balance because headlights and taillights come in pairs and portholes and railings go on both sides of a ship. Visual memory and visual motor skills get a real workout through the concentration needed to put together these childhood favorites. About Croco Studio: Croco Studio is an award-winning team of parent developers intent on creating apps that kids adore and parents trust. Our apps provide a safe playing environment without ads or in-app purchases. At Croco Studio we create apps that encourage kids to learn the fun way. Please contact us with feedback at WeListen@crocostudio.com . We’d love to hear from you.

Busy times lie ahead for restless little hands! Get this app with lots of colorful toys children age 3+ can build themselves! Busy kids are happier! Build and Play 3D - The Sequel is the second edition of the award-winning Build and Play 3D, bringing you new colorful and exciting toys young children can easily build themselves and then control and play with for endless fun. Looks like it’s time for kids to get busy because toys they can assemble and play with in this app include: • ATV • Rocket • Tip truck • Tractor • Submarine • Boat • Helicopter • Astronaut • Cars • Excavator • Satellite And it’s all so simple, they just have to put 3D parts together to get the toy complete, so everyone is a winner! Adding each part is easy as the toy rotates automatically to help children put the missing piece in the right place. Also, they can rotate the toy themselves to check what’s done and see what’s left to add. Kids will have fun joining together wheels, propellers, wings, windows and other parts to create rockets, trucks, cars, boats and much more. Once each toy is complete, it’s time for a background change and see what they can do: the tractor moving over the wheat fields, the submarine diving on the bottom of the ocean, rockets and astronauts exploring the outer space, they are all there to help stimulate young minds’ imagination. App features: - Beautifully designed 3D toys - Intuitive gameplay - Creative animations for each toy - Simple and engaging interface allows for uninterrupted play - Ability to turn sound and music on/off About Croco Studio: Croco Studio is an award-winning team of parent developers intent on creating apps that kids adore and parents trust. Our apps provide a safe playing environment without ads or in-app purchases. At Croco Studio we create apps that encourage kids to learn the fun way. Please contact us with feedback at WeListen@crocostudio.com . We’d love to hear from you.

Venture out on some educational field trips with animal friends at the beach, circus, North Pole, underwater and in the kitchen. Using snap and fit pieces, kids create 12 different interactive scenes. Each one presents a unique early learning challenge from counting how many fish the bear plucks from the ice to watching an elephant blow up different shaped balloons using his trunk. Kids five and under can explore basic preschool concepts in this inviting app from the creators of the Kids Store featured Build and Play 3D. Educational Activities: Play and Discover provides opportunities for active, hands-on learning that engage the senses. It introduces and reinforces these skills in a supported playful environment: •MUSIC: Make music with a magical frog •COLORS: Learn colors at the beach with flying sea turtles •COUNT: See how many fish the polar bear catches •LETTERS: Sing the ABC song under the sea •SHAPES: Join a talented elephant making balloon shapes at the circus •ANIMALS: Help an artistic sheep paint his animal subjects •FRUITS: Bake some tasty fruit pies with a lion •MOVEMENT: Dance to the rhythm with the animal band at the beach Features: •Explore the colorful scenes and solve the puzzles in any order •Learn shapes, colors, numbers, animal and fruit names in 5 different languages – English, Spanish, French, Swedish and Chinese •Self-correcting snap in place puzzle pieces •Funny sound effects and animations •Visual guidance for children needing assistance •Kid friendly theming with built-in positive reinforcement for each success •Child safe for stress-free independent play About Croco Studio: Croco Studio is an award-winning team of parent developers intent on creating apps that kids adore and parents trust. Our apps provide a safe playing environment without ads or in-app purchases. At Croco Studio we create apps that encourage and facilitate learning through play. Please contact us with feedback at WeListen@crocostudio.com . We’d love to hear from you.

Piece together a land of fairy tales! Featuring three games on a magical map, the app encourages children to use their imagination by interacting with fairy tale-themed characters and shapes. The intuitive design allows kids to navigate the map of a magical kingdom and: •discover dragons, princesses, frogs and more in a 3D shape cube •stack toadstools and bottles of magical potion •create a cast of fairy tale characters by piecing them together Kids are rewarded for learning throughout as characters and shapes come alive with stimulating sounds and animations. App features: •Three games in one app to stimulate and engage young imaginations! •Packed with fun and familiar characters - including wizards, knights, ogres, dragons, princesses, princes, frogs, leprechauns, kings and queens •Fun, educational, creative and simple to play •Beautiful designs and fun sounds •Easy and challenging modes for growing kids •Safe play environment means no third party ads, pop-ups or in-app purchase options Fairytale Sort and Stack is an excellent early learning game for young children. Discover a magical world reimagined for today’s creative kids! 3D Sketch Studio allows for a great degree of innovation and creativity. It provides opportunities for open ended exploration, collaboration and problem solving. It’s a perfect choice for parents and teachers interested in STEM (science, technology, engineering & math) education. Geometry is introduced through basic 3D shapes in a fun way - no need for a straightedge, ruler or compass! The ability to manipulate shapes by playing with dimensions and colors will push the limits to what kids can imagine and give them complete creative freedom. Croco Studio’s latest creation offers a 3D design space full of cubes, spheres, domes, pyramids and more ready to be stretched, smashed and stacked into whatever suits your fancy. The rounded dome of a grand building can be flattened into a saucer for the hull of a spaceship. A soup can-shaped cylinder, when pulled, becomes the slender rod used as an axle in a slick race car. Designs can be as basic as a square house with a triangle roof or as complex as a towering, cantilevered skyscraper. The controls are simple enough for a school-aged child to master with practice but have enough sophistication to keep the whole family entertained. Cars, boats, planes, rockets and other popular toys can be recreated by kids with their own personal touch. What would you build if given an endless supply of blocks of every shape, size and color? Features: •Unlimited supply of stretchable shapes •Bright neon-colored palette and cardboard texture •Merge objects •Duplicate shapes as many times as you want •Ability to save and edit multiple projects at once •Edit and modify predefined projects •Rotating 360° view of all sketches •Complete creative freedom About Croco Studio: Croco Studio is an award-winning team of parent developers intent on creating apps that kids adore and parents trust. Our apps provide a safe playing environment without ads or in-app purchases. At Croco Studio we create apps that encourage and facilitate learning through play including: - Build and Play 3D - Build and Play 3D - The Sequel - Fairytale Sort and Stack

description: One ordinary guy Bug lives a bug’s saturated life in the dense forest. He hangs out with dudes, goes out with girls, has a blast at parties and lives with parents… As it happens, the parents constantly over control him, so he often breaks bad for adventures. Only an agile, smart and lucky player with a sense of humor (you) can save the Bug from falling down to the bottom of being and certain ruin.

app_name: 天天拖拉机 - 双抠 升级 80分
description: 免费升级/80分/拖拉机游戏！ 升级是一种流行于中国和海外华人社区的纸牌游戏，一般是四人参加，非常考验玩家的团队合作观念， 如果有良好的团队合作将让你更好的获得好的成绩。其目的是赢取分数、升级以获得胜利。升级游戏可以使用一副牌、两副甚至三到四副扑克牌。在不同的情况下，它有不同的名称：一副牌时也叫打百分、打40，两副牌时也叫八十分、拖拉机、打80、双抠、双升、升级。 打法 升级采用含大小王的整副扑克牌进行游戏，可以使用1-4副牌不等，其中以2副牌的打法最为流行。下面介绍两副牌的打法，其它打法与其有差异的地方在下面列出。 游戏者四人，相对的两人为一方。游戏的目的就是做庄，然后“升级”，一般以先升到A的一方为赢家。 升级中的“主牌”包括常主、当局级数和当局主花色，这些牌大于其它牌。常主包括大小王，有时包括2，两副牌打法中一般不包括[1]。当局级数是在升级过程中逐渐升上来的，它在上一局末尾时确定。当局主花色是在一局开始时确定的，也可以没有主花色，叫做“无主”。 升级中的“分牌”包括5、10和K，其中5代表5分，10和K代表10分，每副牌100分，两副牌就是200分。双方都尽量获取分数，因为一局的胜负是由分数决定的。闲家得到一定的分数就可以上台，而庄家尽量不让闲家得分。这个分数线通常是80分[2]。 在2不是常主的情况下，级数从2开始升（是常主时从3开始），根据每局最后得分情况确定本局升级情况。通常情况下，是以80分为基础上台分数，每40分为一级[3]。 0分：庄家升三级 5-35分：庄家升两级 40-75分：庄家升一级 80-115分：闲家上台 120-155分：闲家上台升一级 160-195分：闲家上台升两级 200-235分：闲家上台升三级 （以后每40分，闲家再升一级） 两副牌最大的得分值为120+(2^24)*80=1342177400 (闲家上台升33554433级) 每一局之前要确定该局的主花色。模式是亮出手里有的该局级数牌，如该局打9，牌手甲亮了黑桃9，而没有人再反应，那么这一局的主花色就是黑桃。在亮主之后，可以进行反主，即某方再亮出更强的牌型以改变该局的主花色。反主的模式有（假设牌手甲亮了黑桃9）： 一般反主：亮出两张相同的级数牌。牌手乙可以亮两张红桃9，把主花色改为红桃； 自保：亮过一张牌的牌手再亮出一张同样的牌。牌手甲再亮出一张黑桃9，又改回黑桃；[4] 反无主：亮出两张相同的王牌。牌手丙亮出2张大王，确定无主。 用两张王牌反无主之后，就不可以再反主了。 一般反主不改变庄家，庄家在上一局末尾根据分数确定。但是第一局例外，第一局要通过抢庄的方式确定庄家。抢庄就是抢亮2（或3），谁最后确定下主花色谁就是第一局的庄家。 每人抓25张牌，留8张底牌供庄家换牌用。[5]庄家可以通过换牌加强自己的牌力。第一张牌也是庄家先出。 游戏中按轮出牌，从第一个人开始，四人以逆时针顺序依次出牌。牌型最强的一位赢下这一轮，下一轮由他出先出牌。赢方还可以获取这一轮中出现的分牌（闲家叫“得分”，庄家叫“跑分”）。 每一轮出牌中，由第一个出牌者确定该轮出牌的牌型。其他三家出的牌都要和第一家出牌的牌型一致，如第一家出草花，另外三家就要跟出草花。如果无法做到，则可另出一张副牌，叫做“随”，或者出主牌压过，叫做“毙”（主牌无法毙主牌）。在“毙”之后，可以再用更大的主牌“盖毙”。 也可以出多张牌。常见的多张牌型有对子、甩牌和拖拉机。甩牌，即多个单张同时出，出这种牌时要保证其他人没有更大的。 Free upgrades / 80 / tractor games! release_text: 最经典的天天拖拉机－双扣升级80分上线Google Play Store! 完美的单机游戏，多个AI陪你一起来升级； 网络大厅也可以进入，欢迎呼朋唤友一起拖拉机！ 1.1.1版更新内容: 1) 修复在线大厅中打A时的界面错乱问题; 2) 修复偶尔出现的亮主按钮出错问题; 祝大家玩得开心！

description: Collection of funny stories God Talks to A Kid Little Jimmy was laying about on a hill in the middle of a meadow on a warm spring day. Puffy white clouds rolled by and he pondered their shape. Soon, he began to think about God. 'God? Are you really there?' Jimmy said out loud. To his astonishment a voice came from the clouds. 'Yes, Jimmy. What can I do for you?' Seizing the opportunity, Jimmy asked, 'God? What is a million years like to you?' Knowing that Jimmy could not understand the concept of infinity, God responded in a manner to which Jimmy could relate. 'A million years to me, Jimmy, is like a minute.' 'Oh,' said Jimmy. 'Well, then, what's a million dollars like to you?' 'A million dollars to me, Jimmy, is like a penny.' 'Wow!' remarked Jimmy, getting an idea. 'You're so generous...can I have one of your pennies?' God replied, 'Sure thing, Jimmy! Just a minute.' Two Polite Diners There are two polite people having dinner together. On the table there is a dish with one big piece of fish and one small piece of fish. They politely say to each other: 'You may choose first.' 'No, you may choose first.' And this goes on for a while. Then the first person says: 'OK, I'll take first.' And he takes the BIG piece of fish. The second person: 'Why did you take the big piece? That's not polite!' The first person says: 'Which piece would *you* have taken?' The second person replies: 'Why, I would have taken the SMALL piece, of course.' The first person says: 'Well, that's what you have now!'

3D Basketball shooting game with realistic physics! Shot from 5 different angles! Flip the ball towards basketball hoop to score. Total of 50 stages! Score the Target point to move to the next stage in limited time. Put your name in the world ranking! Scoring: Clean shot- 5 points + 5 extra seconds! Excellent shot- 3 points (successful shot without touching back board) Good shot- 2 points (successful shot by touching back board)

Really smart bowling game! Top 3D graphics, realistic physics and double player option! Nice lane themes and many ball colors. The ball motion, rotation and controlling is amazing. If you love bowling, you would love this addictive game. Put your name in world ranking! How To Play smart bowling: 1. Drag the ball to left or right to position it. 2. Put finger on the ball and flip to the pins to throw. 3. Gesture curve on the screen to rotate the ball. The speed and angle of flipping determine the motion of the ball. Play it. Love it! 10-PIN BOWLING GAME RULES: A game is divided into 10 frames, each frame has 10 pins. The player is given 2 opportunities to knock down all 10 pins in a frame. STRIKE - a strike is awarded when all ten pins are knocked down with the first ball. The player is awarded ten points, plus a bonus of whatever is scored with the next 'two' balls. SPARE - a spare" is awarded when a player uses both balls of a frame to clear all 10 pins. The player is awarded ten points, plus a bonus of whatever is scored with the next ball. A player can score maximum of 300 points. See Wikipedia for more details. We welcome your rating and comments.

Description: "Beer Pong" is a 3D fun game where you target a beer glass and throw the ball inside it. Play and compete with the computer! How to play: Touch the ball and drag backward to throw it. The ball will fly according to your drag direction. If you can put the ball inside a glass, it will be vanished and you will get points! Your ultimatete goal is to hit and vanish all the glasses! You can start with 3, 6 or 10 glass sets. This game has world ranking implementation!

"Find difference" is a game find the difference between the two pictures above and below. You are required to tap the place of difference between the two pictures within the time limit. The tap can be a picture of either. When you have a mistake tap, the allotted time will be reduced a little. New pictures will be appeared by the update. This game has world ranking. description: A fun animal raising game in the forest! You would love the cute animals in the green wood! Lets take care of the animal in nature and become friendly rapidly! Feed them, raise them and play with them! You have many types of food and items to choose. Play mini game to get bonus. Play and make the forest lively! --- How to play --- * The method of care: - Food can be raised with a care button. - Using go button, an animal can be moved or furniture can be redecorated. - If the double-tap of the screen is carried out, the animal will approach! * How to collect coin: - When you feed them boiled rice or drink them water, the point will be generated. - When eats too much, animals get sleepy. Save coin by sleeping them on bed. - The more animals increase in number, the more coin and experience value are given! * How to increase nuts: Get bonus nuts at level up by taking care of your animal. * How to increase an animal Please touch the lower left "Put" of the animal which can be chosen from a menu screen "animal." * The method of item change: - The collected point can purchase furniture at shop. - The bought item can be chosen from a property button and can be arranged. * About Mini Game It is an easy game. You need to tap the screen once in every 1 hour. You will get various gifts like coin, nuts, item, animals etc! If you have any inquiry, please contact us through gmail address at visitor section. Note: When you uninstall the game, the game data is deleted and gets initialized.

"Hitting Ball" is a kind of "Breakout" game which is bouncing a ball and destroying bricks. A ball travels across the screen, bouncing off the top and side blocks. When a block is hit, the ball bounces away and the block is destroyed. The player loses a turn when the ball touches the bottom of the screen. To prevent this from happening, the player has a movable paddle to bounce the ball upward, keeping it in play. There are some items which take advantage to the game:add extra ball, make the ball penetrate the block, make paddle larger, and make paddle smaller. This game has international and domestic ranking. Can you put your name on the leaderboard also?
release_text: A bug that the paddle does not move to right in the low-resolution devices was fixed.

Refreshing puzzle game with jewels and Knight! There are many colorful crystal jewels! Some are special with Knight! Your target is to connect same kind of jewels! When 3 or more same kind of jewels are joined together, they are erased! Furthermore, various effects will be demonstrated if special jewels are erased. Lets erase more and more jewels to increase your score and put your name in world ranking! *** Rules *** - You can connect same color jewels in any direction - vertical, horizontal or diagonal! - jewels are erased if three or more same jewels are lined together. - If jewels are erased in large numbers at once, special type of jewels will appear! *** Play Modes *** -- Stage Mode -- Clear a stage to go to the next stage. On the back side of some jewels, there are blocks. Break a block by erasing its front jewels. When all blocks are broken, next stage will be unlocked! Play and take the challenge!

description: Price Compare makes it easy to perform price comparisons and add new prices both at home and on the go. Use this app and find hidden deals during this time of price inflation. Is it really worth it to buy in bulk? Is that "sale" really a sale compared to the regular store you go to? These are just two examples of questions Price Compare helps answer. Once you've created products for the app to track, simply enter a price, amount and unit at the top of the screen (see screenshots) and compare unit prices instantly in the list view. Want to update a price to an existing product in the list? Just click on it and pick your store. That's it! You're done! Enter prices as you skim through flyers, walk down an aisle at a grocery store or while you go through your old receipts. All that info comes in handy the next time you see a supposed "sale" at the store. The items in the list view will colour code themselves according to the price entered at the top. Green means it's a deal! Red means you've found better prices previously. Full Version Features - Local file backup/restore support (can be used to copy data over to another device) - Unlimited Categories - Unlimited Stores - Unlimited Products Free Version Limitations (Purchase the unlock key to remove these restrictions): - Max 5 Categories - Max 5 Stores - Max 5 Products Features: - By entering price, amount and mass/volume you can compare against previously entered prices instantly. Conversions between imperial/metric are performed automatically - Builtin tool recommends prices as you enter them - Categorize products under one or more categories - Track stores along with prices to build a price history - Use a star rating to rate product quality when comparing across various brands - Supports metric and imperial system for Mass (mg, g, kg, oz, lb) and Volume (mL, L, oz, gal, oz(uk), gal(uk)) - Unit count is comparisons such as 6 units in Product A vs 4 units in Product B. - Quickly compare various quantities of items to find the best deal - View both via $/Amount and Amount/$ - Many opportunities to compare and save, from groceries to gas, track anything that is sold by mass/volume. Perfect for the frugal shopper, or for anyone looking for the best deals and prices. There's no need to plan ahead for a shopping trip, as all the info is already with your Android device. FAQ How do I delete a product? To delete a product you can go to the Manage Products screen by clicking the menu button on the main screen of the app (the one which appears when you first start the app) and pressing the menu key on the device. Once you reach the products screen you can do a long touch on the product you want to delete. How do I delete a price from a product? To delete a price entered on a product click on the product in either the main screen or Manage Products screen. This will take you to the Product Details screen. From there, click the History tab to show the prices. Long touch the entry you want to delete and select "Delete" from the popup menu. Permissions: - Internet access is used for crash reporting and Google Analytics
release_text: 1.06 Changes - Paid version may now backup/restore Price Compare data to their local file system (you can use these backups to move data between devices) - Read/Write Android permissions required for backup/restore functionality. - Free version can now use all weight/volume/unit types available in app. - Free version now limited to 5 items (to compensate having access to all unit types) - Updated Android Support Library

description: Logic Puzzles on the chess board, designed for kids old enough to understand chess. This game does not teach the rules of chess, the player must know the basic moves. This is not a "mate in X moves" type of puzzles game; it's the type of "mathematical chess" puzzle (for example, placing pieces on the board such that they don't attack each other, or such that every square is attacked, etc). The puzzles are available in multiple difficulties / board sizes, to give the player the chance to gradually familiarize themselves with the problem. For example, the "eight queen" problem (place eight queens on the board in such a way that they don't attack each other) has an easy version (4 queens on a 4x4 board), a medium version (6 queens on a 6x6 board), and the hard version (8 queens on an 8x8 board). More puzzles will be added soon, as the app will be updated.
release_text: Beautified the chess board (added nice texture and border). Added global stats, showing how many puzzles are done out of the total. No longer going straight to the home screen after winning a puzzle - now you can see your solution. Smaller sprites / minor performance improvement. Slightly bigger board - better gameplay on small devices. Swipe to select puzzle / room for more puzzles. Added puzzle: Knights Unguard.

description: The DirectOffice® Mobile SDK Demo viewer app is a demonstration app that showcases the high fidelity document rendering and conversion of the DirectOffice Mobile SDK library. DirectOffice Mobile SDK allows developers to add PC-like viewing of Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel and PDF documents to their apps. Native Rendering DirectOffice Mobile SDK is a standalone software library. Documents are securely rendered directly on the device in your app's sandbox. No need to hand off documents to another app for viewing. No cloud connection or pre-processing of the documents is required. High Fidelity Enterprise users expect their Office documents to look the same on their mobile device as they do on their PCs. DirectOffice Mobile SDK enables your app to render Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and PDF documents with PC-like fidelity for viewing and printing. DirectOffice correctly places paragraphs, text boxes and headers/footers; accurately draws images, shapes, tables, WordArt and SmartArt; and retains the line and page breaks of the original document. Complete Font Solution DirectOffice Mobile SDK includes a complete font system supporting hundreds of fonts in worldwide languages, including Latin, European languages, Cyrillic, Greek, Japanese, Chinese and Korean. DirectOffice uses an intelligent font matching mechanism to ensure the highest quality output in the smallest possible footprint. DirectOffice maintains the look and feel of the original fonts and carefully applies correct character metrics to preserve the original document layout. SDK Licensing Please email us for information on licensing the DirectOffice Mobile SDK.

description: ** 함께하는 재미, 위미(weme)! ** 비행소녀, 새로운 비행이 시작된다! 훨씬 더 재미있는 비행을 함께 즐길 준비 되셨나요? 새롭게 추가된 환상적인 모험 모드 어드벤처로 지금 떠나 보세요~ -----비행소녀 특징----- 두 얼굴의 캐릭터 - 귀엽고 앙증맞은 마법소녀 캐릭터 - 변신하면 8등신 섹시 마녀로 식스센스급의 반전 매력 뿅뿅 스릴 만점 손맛 - 빗발치는 총알을 피하는 짜릿함 - 변신타임, 피버타임의 통쾌한 슈팅 쾌감까지! 험상궂은 보스몬스터 - 스테이지별 4단계로 강해지는 보스몬스터 - 보스별 공략의 맛, 컨트롤의 맛을 느껴보세요! 왼손, 오른손 어느 손이나 OK - 왼손/오른손 조작 선택 가능 - 편한 방향, 편한 손으로 즐겨라! 소녀들의 파트너, 귀요미 펫 - 고유 속성을 가진 귀엽고 다양한 펫 - 펫과 함께 비행하면 더욱 강력해진다! ※ 유료 콘텐츠(아이템) 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. ● 청약 철회 및 구매 대금의 환불 등 - 이용자가 구매한 유료콘텐츠의 경우에는 계약 체결일 또는 유료콘텐츠 이용가능일로부터 7일 이내에 별도의 수수료 없이 청약철회(구매취소)를 할 수 있습니다. 단, 선물 및 이벤트 등 회사나 제3자로부터 무상으로 제공받은 유료콘텐츠, 청약철회 요청 당시 이미 사용하였거나 사용한 것으로 간주되는 유료콘텐츠 등 이에 준하는 특성을 가진 일부 유료콘텐츠에 대하여는 관련 법령에 따라 청약철회(구매취소)가 제한될 수 있습니다. ● 청약 철회에 따른 효과 - 회사는 이용자로부터 재화 등을 반환 받은 경우 3영업일 이내에 대금을 환급합니다 단, 수납확인이 필요한 결제수단의 경우에는 수납확인일로부터 3영업일 이내에 이를 환급하도록 합니다. 이 경우 회사가 환급을 지연한 때에는 그 지연기간에 대하여 관련 법령에서 정한 이율을 곱하여 산정한 지연이자를 지급합니다. ● 미성년자 결제에 대한 조항 - 애플리케이션에서 판매되는 유료콘텐츠를 미성년자가 법정대리인의 동의 없이 결제한 경우, 미성년자 또는 법정대리인은 결제를 취소할 수 있습니다. 단, 미성년자의 유료콘텐츠 결제가 법정대리인으로부터 처분을 허락 받은 재산의 범위 내인 경우 또는 미성년자가 사술 등을 사용하여 성년자로 믿게 한 때에는 취소가 제한됩니다. 유료콘텐츠 구매자가 미성년자인지 여부는 결제가 진행된 단말기 또는 신용카드 등 결제수단의 명의자를 기준으로 판단됩니다. 미성년자 결제취소를 요청하시는 경우 회사의 필요에 따라 미성년자 및 법정대리인을 증명할 수 있는 서류를 제출하여야 합니다. 함께하는 재미를 드리는 모바일 게임 위미(weme)와 함께 하세요! It's a fast and easy way to read Malaysia News in Malay and English on Android. Malaysia News gives you easy access to read the most popular news sources from Malaysia on your Android device. Take this app with you and stay informed with access to the latest news. FEATURES: √ News by site. √ News by category. √ Download news briefs automatically. √ Offline reading. √ News widget. √ Convert webpage to mobile format. √ Remove or sort news sources. √ Edit default news sources √ Subscribe more news sources via RSS √ Import more news sources via OPML √ Option to block images (reduce bandwidth). √ Share news via SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter... *NOTE*: If the application crashes after upgrading, please uninstall and reinstall it.

description: Ever wanted to know what your vampire persona would be named? Enter your name into our app to find out! With 10,000s of possibilities, this app will help you come up with characters for books, roleplaying, and fanfiction. Whether you're penning your Vampire Diaries, scribing by Twilight, or sipping some True Blood with your friends, this app will amuse you and inspire you to name those troublesome victims or meddling side characters! You can also select between different types of vampires names such as Ancient or Sparkly! Other features: -Share the names you like by pressing the menu button! -Move to SD card if you need more space! -Suggest a feature added when you press the menu button! Internet capability is so you can send your feature requests to our server.
release_text: Happy Halloween! We've updated the app with thousands and thousands of new names, taken from historical vampires and old legends! We have added different vampire personas to match your needs! We also added a new feature: by pressing the menu button you can suggest a new feature to us quickly!

description: CPU Awake will avoid your phone going to sleep mode. This is useful when browsing internet, downloading large files, using Wi-Fi and etc.. You can select desired time for keeping CPU running and keeping screen and keyboard lamps on. Desired amount of time can be selected using the sliders. Lamp Dim, Bright or Off status can be selected using the options buttons. Press activate button to start the CPU wake lock. you can see the notification when the CPU wake lock is running. You may use the deactivate button to release the lock, at any time, before the time expires. * for unlimited time lock, set zero times and activate. * app uses android native wakelocks. * app displays adds Key Words: CPU Lock, Wake Lock, Download Help, Lamp Lock, Light Lock, WiFi on, screen on
release_text: Time out selection Unlimited time when time out selected to zero

자동차 브랜드별 이벤트/구매 프로모션 정보 제공 - 차량용품 특가 이벤트 등 주/월단위 다양한 이벤트 진행 이용 문의 사이트: http://auto.danawa.com 이메일: auto@danawa.com ---- 개발자 연락처 : (우) 158-718 서울특별시 양천구 목동동로 233-1, 501(목동, 현대드림타워) 전화:1688-2470 * Largest car portal specializing in   - Domestic, import a new car information, brand / type of vehicle sales conditions, real-time quotes and etc   - Korea's representative treasure dream used car site, Inside Auto, auto shop, etc. See specific room together and my car for sale sell Quote counseling services  * New car information and quote    - All models of the domestic market of more than 250 domestic, imported cars price / quotation, specification / design / options, warranty / recall, image / catalog / offer movie information    - By brand / type of vehicle purchase promotions, offer discounts up to one-stop information service         * Quote Contact    - If you register as a smart quote quote quote calculated Questions & Answers for each brand dealers directly estimate counseling, car buying guides and discounts presents  * Used Car Search     - Provide information on used cars 10 manyeodae with real-time updates in partnership with major domestic supplier of used cars     ※ Affiliates: Dream treasure, auto shop, auto Inside, Cass floor, Cardinals, kapial  * Sell My Car     - Used cars site specializing in auto shops and affiliate sales through the presentation of proven suppliers of hope maeipga 20,000 nationwide in consultation / support        (Simple quote inquiry is also available)  * Lease / Rent     - Rational and effective leasing / rental product information and price comparison services  * News / Community     - News, siseunggi / review and question answers, maintenance / tuning, black box video, gallery and various car hot topics and community services  * Events     - Car Brands Events / offer purchase promotions     - Car Accessories Specials events progress week / month various events     Contact Terms Site: http://auto.danawa.com Email: auto@danawa.com
release_text: 최근 업데이트 내용(v2.0.3) *Push 메시지 선택시 해당링크로 가지 못하는 문제 수정 *일부 디바이스에서 '로그인 상태 유지'로 로그인하여도 로그인이 풀리는 현상 수정 ◆ 이전의 주요 업데이트 내용 *중고차 섹션 개편 - 원하는 중고차를 보다 편리하게 검색할 수 있도록 검색 기능을 개편하였습니다. - 검색된 중고차가 어느 지역 어느 단지에 위치해 있는지 볼 수 있습니다. - 검색조건과 관심매물 저장 기능을 추가하여, 매물 검색이 더 편리해졌습니다. *전체적인 UI 및 스타일 변경 *신차 섹션 개편 - 브랜드/모델에 대한 접근이 용이해졌고 보다 상세한 정보를 제공합니다. *키워드 검색 기능 추가 - 보고자 하는 브랜드/모델명, 시승기 등을 키워드로 검색해 보세요. *마이페이지 기능 추가 - 로그인 후 닉네임을 터치해 보세요. - 알림/쪽지/보관함/내가쓴글 등에 해단 보기/관리가 가능합니다. 오류나, 개선요청사항이 있으면 메뉴>오류신고/문의를 선택해 주세요.

description: Droid Commander Free is a simple two pane manager when your device is in landscape mode, and a simple to use, single pane file manager when your device is in portrait mode. It has a built-in text viewer/editor which can handle small text files (<5 MB), but you can open any file with any installed application. Features: - Basic file management functions: copy, cut, paste, move, delete, rename files stored on your SD card - Select multiple files - Edit text files - Transfer files via Bluetooth - Physical keyboard support. This is a free version, supported by ads, so it will require INTERNET access to retrieve ads and it will use LOCATION services to display ads relevant to your location. Also, being a file manager, it does require access to the sdcard (WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE). All the icons in this application are extracted from Oxygen Icon Theme without any modification Oxygen Homepage: http://www.oxygen-icons.org Oxygen Licence: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.txt These icons may be freely copied by anyone under LGPLv3.

Droid Dashboard is a speedometer application that uses you're phone's internal GPS module to calculate your current speed and display it with large, easy to read, LCD-like fonts. It will also display your total travel time, your average speed, maximum reached speed, your heading and elevation, a nice compass and forward and lateral accelerations. Features: - High accuracy. The speed calculated based on GPS data is more accurate than the one displayed by your car's speedometer - It supports both imperial and metric units - It can record your path, speed, distance, and elevation and save them in a KML file (for Google Earth) - just press "Menu", select "Settings" and "Record track". - It can work in the background, so it can record your movement and speed even while you're talking on the phone. This means that if you really want to exit the application, you have to press "Menu" and select "Exit". It requires the following permissions: - WAKE_LOCK in order to prevent the screen from turning off - ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION (GPS based location) for reading GPS data - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in order to save the KML file - INTERNET in order to display ads Please note that while I've tested the application on several Android devices, there are way to many different Android devices to guarantee that it will work just fine on all of them, so if you encounter a problem with the application, just drop me an email with your phone model and a short description of your problem; I will do my best to fix it ASAP. KW: SPEEDOMETER, GPS SPEED, DASHBOARD

KW: SPEEDOMETER, GPS SPEED, DASHBOARD

Track your expenses with My Budget. My Budget is a simple, user-friendly budget manager. With My Budget you can have a quick overview of your expenses and income, anytime, anywhere. Keep a record of your financial status and improve your savings plans by identifying on what you spend the most money on monthly basis. description: With My Notes you can easily create and save simple notes (e.g. - shopping list, to-do list, etc) on your Android phone. All saved notes can be easily accessed and modified or deleted. All notes will be saved on the internal memory, so you won't lose any note if you remove your memory card. In order to be able to change the fonts, please wait until Google will fix this with an update. KW: Notes, My Notes

description: Pass Safe 2 is a password manager for Android. With Pass Safe 2 you can have all your passwords in one place, protected by a master password, so you'll never lose a password again. All passwords are stored locally on the phone, encrypted so only Pass Safe 2 can read them. There are no visible differences between Pass Safe and Pass Safe 2, the same UI was used, however, there are multiple "under the hood" changes, the most important being the encryption mechanism so the passwords should be properly encrypted or decrypted by different Android versions. Unfortunately, wasn't possible to maintain compatibility with Pass Safe. You will still be able to import unencrypted passwords from Pass Safe or Pass Safe Free. IMPORTANT: - NOT COMPATIBLE WITH PASS SAFE ENCRYPTED DATABASE. KW: Android Password Manager, Password Safe, Save Password, Store Password, Manage Passwords, Password, Manager
release_text: Added options to change font color, size and type. Password database will be exported or imported only in clear text. It will use the device default theme.

description: Before buying a car, it is a good ideea to check the VIN (Vehicle Identification Number). Use VIN Decoder to: - check a car's equipment, production year, country of origin, etc. - check if the VIN is valid You shouldn't rely only on this program before buying a car. You should also check the VIN at a local dealership.

Video Poker - Jacks or Better This is a small, simple video poker, with a double up mini-game - you can double your winnings by trying to guess the correct card sequence from a randomly generated card deck. With each correct guess, the pot is doubled; do one mistake and you lose it ;). Of course, you don't have to tell the exact value of the cards, you just have to guess if it's a high card or a low card. How to play: Start by adding some credits - press menu button and select "Add Credit". Then, select a bet from "+" and "-" buttons. After you've chosen the desired bet, press "Deal" button to deal some cards. Select which cards you want to keep and press "Draw" button. If you have a winning hand (at least a pair of Jacks), you'll have the option to either collect the pot, either to play the double up mini game and try to double your winnings. Double Up mini-game: After each winning hand, you'll have the option to play this mini game, in which you will try to guess if a card selected from a randomly generated card deck is a high card (9, 10, J, Q, K or A) or a low card (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7). 8 is an even card, so you'll win regardless if you chose "HIGH" or "LOW". Balance: Every time you request some credits (from "Add Credit" menu), the amount of credits requested is recorded and stored; this info will be used to calculate your "Balance" - the difference between the amount of requested credit and the amount of credit you have won. Good players will have a positive balance; bad players will have a negative one. Keywords: Video Poker Free, Video Poker, Poker, Jacks or Better

מערכת שעות היא האפליקציה היחידה המותאמת לדוברי עברית. באפשרותכם להזין מקצועות למערכת, להוסיף מקצועות חדשים או לערוך מקצועות קיימים, ולהכניס נתונים כגון שמות מורים, שיעורי בית ועוד. בנוסף ניתן להוסיף ווידג'ט המראה את השיעור הנוכחי ואת הבא אחריו (על מנת שיעבוד היטב יש לעדכן את שעות השיעור במסך המערכת היומית) נשמח להערות בונות ולדירוג מפרגן Schedule is the only application tailored for Hebrew. description: Speedy Wheel will take you through floating race tracks and teleport gates, all set in a futuristic environment where you can break the laws of physics! Reach new longer distances and ride your Wheel up to astonishing velocity!!! Find gadgets and secret spots that will help you to survive longer. NOTE: The game is not completed yet as I'm developing it only in my free time. There could be errors or bugs and some of the rules are still temporary, while the environment is under development. How to Play: - Touch the left side of the screen to accelerate and slide to steer (advanced control is available) - Tilt option available - Landscape or Portrait mode available even during the game Game Features: - An endless race to avoid obstacles and enemies - Increase your level of experience along with your speed - Find gadgets to survive longer* - Capture screenshots and share them - Connect to Google Play, earn Achievements and climb the Leaderboards!
release_text: New Gadget: Jetpack The tutorial is not mandatory anymore Internal Updates: Improved cone collision Improved gadgets inventory

description: ** Please contact me if you encounter any issues with this app. Please. Because we developers are unable to get ** back to the users directly which is very sad so let me help you if my app gave you a problem. You can still leave a ** negative feedback but still, please let me help. You can email me through this page or through the app. Thanks! Ever considering having a Smart Cover feature for your Android Device? Now you can!! This application allows you to Turn On your screen after removing it from cover. Gentlemen, do you keep your device in your pockets? Check your device status immediately after taking it out without pressing any buttons!! Ladies, do you keep your device in your bag? This application will turn on your screen for you without you having to reach for the buttons! Might you be using a Device Wallet which also acts as a Cover? Additional Features ** Turn on your Screen and automatically unlock!! ** Turn on/off your screen without using Power or Home buttons. ** Perform magic tricks. ^_^ ** Disable in Landscape mode ** Beep option when turning on/off screen (Thanks Brian) ** Choice of tone for the above feature (Thanks Novak, Andreas) ** Vibrate option when turning on/off screen (Thanks Ignatius) Note: ** Due to the sensitivity of the Proximity Sensor, I strongly suggest not to use the function turn off screen by this application. To turn off the feature, just set the duration to -1 seconds. Instead, I suggest that you use another application to lock your screen. Here, I suggest using "Lock Screen Now" which is also developed by me. There are also many other Lock Screen applications which you can find on Google Play. ** Do note that this application requires proximity sensor to work. ** Requires Device Administrator for the Turn Off screen feature. ** To UNINSTALL this application, you have to first remove the Device Administrator rights for this application. When you choose to uninstall this application, it will prompt you to remove the Device Administrator Rights. If not, please go to Settings > Security > Device Administrator > Uncheck this application.
release_text: 18th Oct New Feature: As requested by user, added additional duration for screen off/on New Feature: As requested by user, added option for different tones for screen off/on 2014 6th Feb New Feature: Locale language available for Russian Fix: Now the vibrate duration will be correct. But Turn on screen will feel longer than turn off screen 11th Feb Fix: Updated the Russian language with the help of a user. Thanks!

"a casual game that perfectly mixes original gameplay, humor and cute design. Must-have." - appszoom "An interesting little gem of a game" - Droid Gamers “packs a solid punch of terrific gameplay and great humor” - Android Entity In a world of convenience, junk food and flabbiness, one government has implemented a drastic new health plan to end the obesity crisis. And one man has to survive it… RUN FATTY RUN is frantic arcade action that pits one overweight man against the forces of natural selection. Guide Bert through an urban landscape of hills, obstacles, tough old ladies and his most relentless enemy – food. Run, smash and roll your way home as Bert defies the government’s best intentions. Some Android devices are not capable of detecting quick taps. If you find that the game is not behaving as expected, please grab your refund and contact us at support@disparitygames.com Thank-you. DataViz' acclaimed technology ensures all original file formatting is retained once a file has been edited on an Android device & then forwarded on. •Send & receive attachments. •Native. Open Word & Excel files on your Android phone without any desktop or server conversion needed. •Nothing new to learn. Documents To Go was designed & developed with the Android device user in mind.

Never forget a password again. Easily store, protect, and sync your PINs, passwords, usernames, logins, and other sensitive info on your Android phone or tablet. The new Passwords Plus 3.0 features free editing and creating of up to 25 passwords for up to 60 days for new users. Version 3.0 also has a new installation wizard that guides you through entering and saving passwords with ‘password suggestions’ that make it easier to get started (especially for all of the new passwords you'll likely need to create due to the recent "Heartbleed" internet security bug and other, internet security breaches!). Note: After 60 days, your passwords will be view-only and you will be without backup/restore options and the ability to auto-sync passwords between devices. You have the option to purchase at any point during your trial. The purchased version includes: unlimited passwords, data backup, syncing between devices where Passwords Plus is owned, and removal of in-app advertising. To purchase, just go to the menu in Passwords Plus on your device and tap 'Store' to follow the in-app purchase steps. Current license owners: If you have already purchased, your current features will remain intact with your v3 update and you will have ad removal in place for 1 year. Why Passwords Plus? 1. Keep your private info “in sync” across all of your devices thanks to our secure cloud storage and SamePage™ technology. Changes made on your Android device will automatically appear wherever Passwords Plus 3.0 or 2.0 is installed (Windows, Mac and/or iOS). 2. Up-and-running in less than 5 minutes – Easy to setup and unlike other apps, no need to open a 3rd party cloud account in order to sync, backup or restore your confidential data. 3. Proven industry experience – Founded in 1984, DataViz is an industry leader in developing productivity solutions, including mobile and password protection software for the past 10+ years. Key Features: • Secure – 256-bit AES encryption (military grade) keeps secret data safe and secure–just like a locked vault! • Auto-Synchronization – Updates made on one device will automatically be reflected on all devices (option available to turn on/off). • Backup/Restore – Included free! Passwords Plus info can be retrieved if your phone, tablet or computer is lost or stolen (when auto-sync is enabled). • Generate Password – Automatically generate strong/unique passwords to avoid using “obvious” or “duplicate” passwords. • Auto Lock – Set Passwords Plus to lock after a specified time period to protect your data (phone/tablet only). • Self-destruct – Configure to erase your data if multiple wrong passwords are attempted. • Password suggestions included – Get started quickly with minimal data entry. • Categories & favorites – Customize categories and set favorites to easily find frequently used records. • Responsive sales and support teams in-house! *Note: Passwords Plus is not just for Android… Windows and Mac desktop/laptop versions are available for purchase from DataViz and the Mac App Store respectively. More info: http://www.dataviz.com/BuyPWPapps Passwords Plus for the iPad/iPhone is available on the App Store.
release_text: Version 3.001 (build 356) - Minor enhancements Version 3.000 (build 354) - Free editing & creating of up to 25 passwords for up to 60 days for new users - Installation wizard with ‘password suggestions’ - Password suggestions toolbar with dozens of samples Version 2.005 (build 326) - Various bug fixes & enhancements Version 2.004 (build 317) - Various bug fixes Version 2.003 (build 284) - Now optimized for Tablets - Various bug fixes

description: Beam Runner pays homage to the classic games from the 80's with it's simplistic yet retro game style. Take your ship & fight your way through the levels, as you progress you will meet increasingly more and difficult enemy ships. - On-line high scores - Increasing difficulty levels - Snappy retro sound effects & music - Touch and Tilt controls - Collect crates for ship bonus - Collect +1's to get ship power ups - 7 in total
release_text: - Speed increases for some devices - minor bug fixes

description: Allows you to gather system logs and send them via email, messaging, etc. Terrific tool for working with users to debug application issues. Get Logs is a very simple tool for developers and testers to use.
release_text: - updated for 4.x versions (JellyBean removed ability to read logs) - fixed gargantuan pick list for apps to handle "sending" of information.

description: Functionalities: - offline database, don't need a connection or to download something the first time - filter cards by color, type (artifact, land) and rarity - search cards for name - save cards as favourite - browse all cards of a set (or a search) through an easy interface - I'm feeling lucky: browse cards randomly - images are provided by http://api.mtgdb.info/ and internet is required - card prices from TCG player Latest Magic The Gathering sets provided: Dragons of Tarkir, Fate Reforged, Commander 2014, Khans of Tarkir, Magic 2015, Vintage Masters, Conspiracy, Journey into Nyx, Duel Decks: Jace vs. Vraska, Born of the Gods, Commander 2013 Edition, Theros, Duel Decks: Heroes vs. Monsters, From the Vault: Twenty, Magic 2014 Core Set, Modern Masters, Dragon's Maze, Duel Decks: Sorin vs. Tibalt

이런 젠~장! 말년에 전쟁이라니! 말년병장 최종훈과 함께 즐기는 군디컬 부대육성 SNG, 출시! 이제 터치 하나로 아파치부터 항공모함까지 지휘하라! ** 다시 군대를 가야 하는 아찔한 상황? 라면 OK!** SNG. 농장경영을 버리고 무기와 전투를 품다! 침략! 기지방어! 친구파병! 친구들과 함께하는 밀리터리 전쟁 SNG가 시작된다. 밀리터리 전략 게임은 어렵다?? 는 아니지 말입니다! 시키는 대로 터치 터치면 남녀노소 신검 없이 입대가능! 이제 누구나 사령관이 되어 강력한 부대를 육성하세요! 탱크만 나오는 밀리터리 게임은 Good-Bye~ 탱크와 보병 전투는 기본! 항공모함에 코브라헬기, 스텔스 전투기까지!! 육해공 3군 유닛이 총집합한 메카톤급 스케일! 쉽지만 만만하게 보면 패배의 쓴잔을 마시게 될 것이다. 유능한 사령관이라면 유닛 레벨업과 조합은 기본! 핵폭판부터 공습작전까지 적재적소 다양한 전술 활용과 유닛 간 상성 활용은 필수! 당신의 전략이, 전쟁의 승패를 결정합니다. ** 둘이 경계근무 중 하나가 죽어도 모를 파격적 이벤트! ** 레벨업 할 때마다 대뇌 전두엽을 자극하는 짜릿한 경품이 펼쳐진다 몽클레어 패딩부터 갤력시노트3에 초호화 탱크 프라모델까지! 아이템 지급은 기본! 원하는 경품, 원하는 대로 가져가세요! 친구 초대와 추천인 보상은 기본! 하지만 레어 유닛부터 스페셜 유닛까지 그 가치가 남다르다. 둘이 경계근무 중 하나가 죽어도 모를 파.격.혜.택 처음부터 앞서나가세요! ※ 유료 콘텐츠(아이템) 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. ● 청약 철회 및 구매 대금의 환불 등 - 이용자가 구매한 유료콘텐츠의 경우에는 계약 체결일 또는 유료콘텐츠 이용가능일로부터 7일 이내에 별도의 수수료 없이 청약철회(구매취소)를 할 수 있습니다. 단, 선물 및 이벤트 등 회사나 제3자로부터 무상으로 제공받은 유료콘텐츠, 청약철회 요청 당시 이미 사용하였거나 사용한 것으로 간주되는 유료콘텐츠 등 이에 준하는 특성을 가진 일부 유료콘텐츠에 대하여는 관련 법령에 따라 청약철회(구매취소)가 제한될 수 있습니다. ● 청약 철회에 따른 효과 - 회사는 이용자로부터 재화 등을 반환 받은 경우 3영업일 이내에 대금을 환급합니다 단, 수납확인이 필요한 결제수단의 경우에는 수납확인일로부터 3영업일 이내에 이를 환급하도록 합니다. 이 경우 회사가 환급을 지연한 때에는 그 지연기간에 대하여 관련 법령에서 정한 이율을 곱하여 산정한 지연이자를 지급합니다. ● 미성년자 결제에 대한 조항 - 애플리케이션에서 판매되는 유료콘텐츠를 미성년자가 법정대리인의 동의 없이 결제한 경우, 미성년자 또는 법정대리인은 결제를 취소할 수 있습니다. 단, 미성년자의 유료콘텐츠 결제가 법정대리인으로부터 처분을 허락 받은 재산의 범위 내인 경우 또는 미성년자가 사술 등을 사용하여 성년자로 믿게 한 때에는 취소가 제한됩니다. 유료콘텐츠 구매자가 미성년자인지 여부는 결제가 진행된 단말기 또는 신용카드 등 결제수단의 명의자를 기준으로 판단됩니다. 미성년자 결제취소를 요청하시는 경우 회사의 필요에 따라 미성년자 및 법정대리인을 증명할 수 있는 서류를 제출하여야 합니다. ** 함께하는 재미를 전달하는 모바일 게임 브랜드 위미(weme)와 함께 하세요! ** ** FAQ로 찾아보고, 서로서로 묻고 답하고, 1:1문의로 물어보고! This app is developed for students who want to have basic computer programs with them always. The given programs are from many different languages. Compilation can be done on TC /GCC/ JVM etc.. In first version of the app User can view various programs on Programming languages: * C * C++ * JAVA Scripting language: * Perl * Python * php Data Structures programs: * Arrays * LinkedList * Trees ******************************************** User can also add their own programs, view/edit and delete the added programs. Adding program:- 1>From Sd card 2>Write program ******************************************* Programs can be shared with Facebook/Whatsapp and any other social networking or mailed or messaged.....
release_text: *Unwanted permissions in the last update removed as requested by our users. *User can now notify us if searched program is not available. *Few new programs and other important data(i.e. Interview questions) are added daily in the newly added tab TODAY'S PROGRAM. *User can also search any program e.g. C/C++/JAVA online inside the application. *Few bug fixes. *A new tab for Algorithms inside Data Structures. *Many more programs added.

description: IP Tools - universal application to identify problems in computer networks, as well as a convenient and powerful tool for tuning the network. Using IP Tools you can easily diagnose the problem in the network (in this case be at any distance). The simple interface allows you to quickly find your external ip address to receive detailed information on any other Internet address and access to the most popular program that you use on your computer. A special service connection test will inform you when you are not connected to the Internet. Features: ✓ Detailed information about your network and device. ✓ Getting data about the site and its owner. ✓ Configuring the router directly from the phone. ✓ Detecting by ip. ✓ Port scanning, network scanning. ✓ Ping, Trace route, Whois. ✓ IP Calculator. ✓ Control joints and connections. ✓ Wake on LAN. ✓ DNS Lookup. ✓ And more...
release_text: IP Tools 6.3 * Improved Trace route tool. * UI fixes and improvements. * Minor internal enhancements. * Some lists now inverted(Ping,Traceroute,LAN & Port scanner).

description: Steel MTG Life is a utility to help track life and poison counters for the trading card game Magic: The Gathering. Features: - Track any number of players (up to 100). - Customize player names. - Countdown timer (enable in settings). - Simulate dice rolls and coin flips (customize in settings). - No ads!
release_text: - Health calculator feature added. [v0.6.0] - Increase/decrease by 5 on long press feature added by request. [v0.6.0] - Fix for error caused while changing orientation. [v0.5.3] - Default number of players setting added. [v0.5.2] - Minor updates to theme colors and Settings. [v0.5.1] - Updated graphics. Extra themes implemented (WIP). [v0.5.0] - Fix for error caused by null input for default values in preferences. [v0.4.5] - Title bar removed for extra viewing space. [v0.4.4]

description: PushDoll is based on the traditional game, “Sokoban” Designed with fairy-taleish graphics matching to each characteristic world. “Voodoo doll”, the main character of this game under disguise, solves the problems took place in each world. Features - Super easy operation - Beautiful fairy-taleish graphics - Convenient hint system How to play - Tap the desired location on the screen, and the character (“Voodoo doll”) moves to the location. - Move the character next to the statue and tap&slide the character to the desired direction to move the statue. - Each stage is cleared when all statues are moved to the determined locations (the pedestals). Questions - bclouds1@gmail.com
The rules are simple: Touch, bounce, and don't touch any of the spikes! Collect the stars and unlock new looks for Bouncy Bit! Unlock all the hats and the ads will vanish!

So this is were the app description would go huh? Well, I don't think you should get one. Why? That's none of your business. This is a game and you don't HAVE to play it now do you? If you think you can beat me then go ahead and download the 1080 Challenge. If you don't, I'll just assume that you could not beat me and, having realized that, decided to not download the game. I use the term "game" loosely of course. There's some screen shots below this but I'm not entirely sure how useful those are going to be. You either have what it takes or you don't. Your decision on weather or not you'll download and participate in the 1080 Challenge really answers that doesn't it? Go ahead and try if you like. Or don't, it doesn't matter. Of course, not trying is the losing of losing.

Simple, easy to use Countdown Timer + Stopwatch. Enter the time interval, click Start. When expired, a sound/vibrate notification is fired - large buttons - easier to see and touch - spinner-free time entry - persistent notifications - wakes up the device if in sleep mode - custom reminder labels - new: stopwatch mode (Count Up) - snooze button (full version only) - selectable alarm sounds (full version only)
release_text: Added Stopwatch mode (Count Up); Notification icon made optional; Added the button for clearing the reminder label

description: How many balloons can your toddlers pop up? Babies and toddlers will love this eye-catching game. This game is amazingly relaxing and strangely addictive. Simplicity is the key to a successful app for babies. It is extremely easy to play and super fun! Touch and Pop, that's it! There are lots of colourful balloons which will help your babies/toddlers to learn colours. Playing this game will improve your kids focusing and timing ability. When should your babies play? * When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying or you are not able to deal w/ them, playing this game can hold your baby's attention. This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Caution: Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.
release_text: v1.8 === * Various bug fixes. v1.5 === * More games menu added. * Menu font is changed v1.4 === * Balloons are now swinging !!! They are much more real. * Minor Auto rotation bug fixes. All devices now are being supported!! + Added various balloons + Added pause menu options * It is now possible to increase/decrease spawn time * Audio volume can be adjusted through options pane * Auto rotation support added. Since many balloons can ben popped at the same time, it is more funny!!!

Dash Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Dash Light integrates Tiny Flashlight with DashClock Widget. DashClock is a replacement lock screen clock widget for Android 4.2+ phones and tablets. To add a new Dash Light toggle: 1. On your lock screen or home screen add a new widget. Pick DashClock. 2. Add Extension 3. Choose Dash Light

Fast Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Fast Light gives you quick and convenient access to your flashlight via 3 different methods: * Shake on Lock screen * Voice commands on Lock screen * Persistent notification Shake on Lock screen: ================ * You must already have a screen lock before attempting to use this feature. If you don't have one, open Device Settings -> Security -> Screen lock and pick one. * Face Unlock may be problematic, because the camera interferes with the flashlight function * Enable Shake on Lock screen from Fast Light * Press the power button to turn off your screen * Press the power button again to show the lock screen - do NOT unlock the device * Shake Custom lock screen applications (downloaded from the market): ================ Custom lock screens do not behave like the standard ones. Right now Fast Light supports the following custom lock screen apps: * GO Locker * WidgetLocker * MagicLocker Timeout setting and accidental starting ================ Fast Light uses an advanced shake-detection algorithm, but there is always the possibility of false-positives. The most frequent case of accidental starting of the light happens while the device is in the user's pocket during a walk and the power button gets pressed. If a timeout value has not been set the battery will be drained very fast. The recommended Timeout value is 20 seconds. Voice on Lock screen ================ * This feature is available on Android 2.2 and newer * You must already have a screen lock before attempting to use this feature. If you don't have one, open Device Settings -> Security -> Screen lock and pick one. * Face Unlock may be problematic, because the camera interferes with the flashlight function * Read the info for custom lock screens and the Timeout setting in the Shake on Lock screen section above. * Enable Voice on Lock screen from Fast Light * Press the power button to turn off your screen * Press the power button again to show the lock screen - do NOT unlock the device * You can say one of the following commands in English - "light" - "lights" - "torch" * Additional languages will be added soon. If you are on Android 4.0 or earlier: ================ Voice recognition requires an active internet connection. You can change the language from: Device Settings -> Voice input & output -> Voice recognizer settings If you are on Android 4.1 and newer: ================ You can install a language pack for most popular languages, so the voice recognition will not require an active internet connection. To change the language: Device Settings -> Language & input -> Language To install a language pack: Device Settings -> Language & input -> scroll down -> Voice Search -> Offline speech recognition Persistent notification: ================ The persistent notification allows you to toggle the light from anywhere as long as the notification bar is accessible. There is an additional option, which shows the battery usage and remaining time while the light is on (only on devices, which has a camera flash). Before using the battery usage feature, you must calibrate it. Here's how: The light should be kept on for 5-10 minutes for maximum accuracy. Make sure the device is NOT charging. After the first data appears, you must NOT turn it off. The longer you keep the light ON, the better accuracy. This has to be done only once. Read Phone State permission: ================ This permission is used to stop the light, when the device starts ringing or prevent the light from starting while in a call.

Light Bulb is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Light Bulb is a handy screen lamp useful on devices, which don't have a camera flash. Features: =========== * Change the screen and bulb brightness by swiping up and down * Different background colors. Swipe left and right * Light Bulb remembers automatically your color and brightness settings. Available Colors: =========== Blue, Cyan, Green, Yellow, Orange, Red, Purple, Grey

Light Table is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Light Table is a device used to review photographic film or artwork placed on top of it. It provides even illumination of the subject from below through a translucent cover and fluorescent lights that emit little heat. Features: * The Light Table plugin hides all navigation elements * Puts the screen brightness to maximum level * Removes the ad banner if there is one What you get is a clean and well lit surface. Light Table is optimal on 7+ inch devices where the size of the display allows you to place larger objects on top of it.

Task Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Task Light integrates Tiny Flashlight with Tasker and Locale. Tasker / Locale allows you to fully automate tasks on your device and now you can start the camera flash with a task / setting. Ex: turn on the light as a notification, when the phone is ringing. To add a new Task Light action in Tasker: ============================== Add Profile -> New Task -> Add Action -> Plugin -> Task Light -> Tap the Configuration button To add a new Task Light setting in Locale: ============================== Add situation -> Add condition -> Add setting -> Task Light at the bottom of the list Features: * 4 modes: LED Light, Screen Light, Strobe Light, Morse Code * Choose LED light brightness on supported devices * Options: - Timeout, Vibrate, Light Notification, Colors, Testing option CAUTION: Strobe lighting can trigger seizures in photosensitive epilepsy!
release_text: Added Screen Light, Strobe Light, and Morse Code

description: Toggle Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Toggle Light integrates Tiny Flashlight with Power Toggles. Power Toggles is an advanced power control widget and now you can start the camera flash with a custom Toggle Light switch. To create a new Toggle Light widget: 1. Find the Power Toggles widget and add it to the home screen 2. Tap on the "Add Toggle" button 3. Choose the "Custom" tab 4. Tap "Toggle Light" from the list

Warning Lights is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Simulate real warning, signal, stop, and traffic lights. This plugin is especially useful as an additional safety measure on the road. Can be used as a mobile signal light, when changing a tire or in case of an accident. Features: =========== * 2 different types of lights: Warning Lights and Traffic Light ( Ampel ) * 3 colors: Red, Yellow, Green * 3 types of controls: - Auto: changes the lights with a predefined delay - Tap the screen once to change the state - Double Tap to change the state

Wear Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it. Wear Light enables the full display brightness of your Android Wear smart watch. A fast and handy light source. Very convenient when you need to hit the lock in the dark. Features: ========= * Turn on the light by saying "Open Light" * Full screen brightness * Automatically installed on you Android Wear smart watch
